00661 
00662 void HandleLapTopCursorUpDate()
00663 {
00664       if(guiPreviousLapTopCursor==guiCurrentLapTopCursor)
00665        return;
00666       switch(guiCurrentLapTopCursor)
00667       {
00668             case LAPTOP_PANEL_CURSOR:
00669                   MSYS_SetCurrentCursor(CURSOR_NORMAL);
00670             break;
00671             case LAPTOP_SCREEN_CURSOR:
00672                   MSYS_SetCurrentCursor(CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
00673             break;
00674       case LAPTOP_WWW_CURSOR:
00675                   MSYS_SetCurrentCursor(CURSOR_WWW);
00676             break;
00677       }
00678   guiPreviousLapTopCursor=guiCurrentLapTopCursor;
00679       
00680 }
00681 void 
00682 GetLaptopKeyboardInput()
00683 {
00684   InputAtom                         InputEvent;
00685       POINT  MousePos;
00686 
00687       GetCursorPos(&MousePos);
00688 
00689       fTabHandled = FALSE;
00690 
00691   while (DequeueEvent(&InputEvent) == TRUE)
00692   {
00693             // HOOK INTO MOUSE HOOKS
00694             switch(InputEvent.usEvent)
00695         {
00696                   case LEFT_BUTTON_DOWN:
00697                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_DOWN, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
00698                         break;
00699                   case LEFT_BUTTON_UP:
00700                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_UP, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y ,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);               
00701                         break;
00702                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_DOWN:
00703                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_DOWN, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
00704                         break;
00705                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_UP: 
00706                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_UP, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);   
00707                         break;
00708                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_REPEAT: 
00709                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_REPEAT, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);                 
00710                         break;
00711                   case LEFT_BUTTON_REPEAT: 
00712                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_REPEAT, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);                        
00713                         break;
00714         }
00715             
00716             HandleKeyBoardShortCutsForLapTop( InputEvent.usEvent, InputEvent.usParam, InputEvent.usKeyState );
00717             
00718       }
00719 }

00721 //This is called only once at game initialization.
00722 UINT32 LaptopScreenInit()
00723 {
00724       //Memset the whole structure, to make sure of no 'JUNK'
00725       memset( &LaptopSaveInfo, 0, sizeof( LaptopSaveInfoStruct ) );
00726 
00727       LaptopSaveInfo.gfNewGameLaptop = TRUE;
00728 
00729       InitializeNumDaysMercArrive();
00730 
00731       //reset the id of the last hired merc
00732       LaptopSaveInfo.sLastHiredMerc.iIdOfMerc = -1;
00733 
00734       //reset the flag that enables the 'just hired merc' popup
00735       LaptopSaveInfo.sLastHiredMerc.fHaveDisplayedPopUpInLaptop = FALSE;
00736 
00737       //Initialize all vars
00738       guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_EMAIL;
00739       guiPreviousLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_NONE;
00740       guiCurrentWWWMode = LAPTOP_MODE_NONE;
00741       guiCurrentSidePanel = FIRST_SIDE_PANEL;
00742       guiPreviousSidePanel = FIRST_SIDE_PANEL;
00743   
00744       
00745       gfSideBarFlag=FALSE;
00746       gfShowBookmarks=FALSE;
00747       InitBookMarkList();
00748       GameInitAIM();
00749       GameInitAIMMembers();
00750       GameInitAimFacialIndex();
00751       GameInitAimSort();
00752       GameInitAimArchives();
00753       GameInitAimPolicies();
00754       GameInitAimLinks();
00755       GameInitAimHistory();
00756       GameInitMercs();
00757       GameInitBobbyR();
00758       GameInitBobbyRAmmo();
00759       GameInitBobbyRArmour();
00760       GameInitBobbyRGuns();
00761       GameInitBobbyRMailOrder();
00762       GameInitBobbyRMisc();
00763       GameInitBobbyRUsed();
00764       GameInitEmail();
00765       GameInitCharProfile();
00766       GameInitFlorist();
00767       GameInitInsurance();
00768       GameInitInsuranceContract();
00769       GameInitFuneral();
00770       GameInitSirTech();
00771       GameInitFiles(); 
00772       GameInitPersonnel();
00773 
00774       // init program states
00775       memset( &gLaptopProgramStates, LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MINIMIZED, sizeof( gLaptopProgramStates ) );
00776 
00777       gfAtLeastOneMercWasHired = FALSE;
00778 
00779       //No longer inits the laptop screens, now InitLaptopAndLaptopScreens() does
00780 
00781       return( 1 );
00782 }

00831 INT32 EnterLaptop()
00832 {
00833       //Create, load, initialize data -- just entered the laptop.
00834   
00835   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00836   INT32 iCounter=0; 
00837 
00838       static BOOLEAN fEnteredFromGameStartup = TRUE;
00839       // we are re entering due to message box, leave NOW!
00840       if( fExitDueToMessageBox  == TRUE )
00841       {
00842             
00843             return ( TRUE );
00844       }
00845 
00846       //if the radar map mouse region is still active, disable it.
00847       if( gRadarRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_ENABLED )
00848       {
00849             MSYS_DisableRegion( &gRadarRegion );
00850 /*
00851             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00852                   DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_LAPTOP_DEFAULT, L"Mapscreen's radar region is still active, please tell Dave how you entered Laptop.", LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00853             #endif
00854 */
00855       }
00856 
00857       gfDontStartTransitionFromLaptop = FALSE;
00858 
00859       //Since we are coming in from MapScreen, uncheck the flag
00860       guiTacticalInterfaceFlags &= ~INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN;
00861 
00862       // ATE: Disable messages....
00863       DisableScrollMessages( );
00864 
00865       // Stop any person from saying anything
00866       StopAnyCurrentlyTalkingSpeech( );
00867       
00868       // Don't play music....
00869       SetMusicMode( MUSIC_LAPTOP );
00870 
00871       // Stop ambients...
00872       StopAmbients( );
00873 
00874       // WANNE 2: disabled rain sound when laptop is displayed
00875       ////if its raining, start the rain showers
00876       //if( IsItRaining() )
00877       //{
00878       //    //Enable the rain delay warning
00879       //    giRainDelayInternetSite = -1;
00880 
00881       //    //lower the volume 
00882       //    guiRainLoop = PlayJA2Ambient( RAIN_1, LOWVOLUME, 0 );
00883       //}
00884 
00885       
00886       //open the laptop library
00887 //    OpenLibrary( LIBRARY_LAPTOP );
00888 
00889       //pause the game because we dont want time to advance in the laptop
00890       PauseGame();
00891 
00892       // set the fact we are currently in laptop, for rendering purposes
00893       fCurrentlyInLaptop = TRUE;
00894 
00895       
00896 
00897       // clear guiSAVEBUFFER
00898       //ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(guiSAVEBUFFER,      0, 0, 640, 480, Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(0, 0, 0)) );
00899   // disable characters panel buttons
00900 
00901   // reset redraw flag and redraw new mail
00902       fReDrawScreenFlag = FALSE;
00903   fReDrawNewMailFlag = TRUE;
00904 
00905       // setup basic cursors
00906   guiCurrentLapTopCursor=LAPTOP_PANEL_CURSOR;
00907       guiPreviousLapTopCursor=LAPTOP_NO_CURSOR;
00908       
00909       // sub page
00910       giCurrentSubPage = 0;
00911       giCurrentRegion=EMAIL_REGION;
00912       
00913       // load the laptop graphic and add it
00914       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00915       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\laptop3.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00916       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiLAPTOP));
00917   
00918       // background for panel
00919       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00920       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\taskbar.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00921       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiLaptopBACKGROUND));
00922   
00923 
00924       // background for panel
00925       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00926       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\programtitlebar.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00927       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiTITLEBARLAPTOP));
00928       
00929       // lights for power and HD
00930       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00931       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\lights.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00932       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiLIGHTS));
00933 
00934       // icons for title bars
00935       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00936       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\ICONS.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00937       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiTITLEBARICONS));
00938       
00939       // load, blt and delete graphics
00940       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00941       FilenameForBPP( "LAPTOP\\NewMailWarning.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile );
00942       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiEmailWarning ) );
00943       // load background
00944       LoadDesktopBackground( );
00945 
00946 
00947       guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_NONE;
00948       //MSYS_SetCurrentCursor(CURSOR_NORMAL);
00949       
00950       guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_NONE;
00951       guiPreviousLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_NONE;
00952       guiCurrentWWWMode = LAPTOP_MODE_NONE;
00953       guiCurrentSidePanel = FIRST_SIDE_PANEL;
00954       guiPreviousSidePanel = FIRST_SIDE_PANEL;
00955   gfSideBarFlag=FALSE;
00956   CreateLapTopMouseRegions();
00957   RenderLapTopImage();
00958   HighLightRegion(giCurrentRegion);
00959       //AddEmailMessage(L"Entered LapTop",L"Entered", 0, 0);
00960   //for(iCounter=0; iCounter <10; iCounter++)
00961       //{
00962        //AddEmail(3,5,0,0);
00963       //}
00964       // the laptop mouse region
00965 
00966 
00967       // reset bookmarks flags
00968       fFirstTimeInLaptop = TRUE;
00969 
00970       // reset all bookmark visits
00971       memset( &LaptopSaveInfo.fVisitedBookmarkAlready, 0, sizeof( LaptopSaveInfo.fVisitedBookmarkAlready ) );
00972 
00973       // init program states
00974       memset( &gLaptopProgramStates, LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MINIMIZED, sizeof( gLaptopProgramStates ) );
00975 
00976       // turn the power on
00977       fPowerLightOn = TRUE;
00978 
00979       // we are not exiting laptop right now, we just got here
00980       fExitingLaptopFlag = FALSE;
00981 
00982       // reset program we are maximizing
00983       bProgramBeingMaximized = -1;
00984 
00985       // reset fact we are maximizing/ mining
00986       fMaximizingProgram = FALSE;
00987       fMinizingProgram = FALSE;
00988 
00989 
00990       // initialize open queue
00991       InitLaptopOpenQueue( );
00992 
00993 
00994   gfShowBookmarks=FALSE;
00995   LoadBookmark( );
00996   SetBookMark(AIM_BOOKMARK);
00997       LoadLoadPending( );
00998 
00999       DrawDeskTopBackground( );
01000 
01001       // create region for new mail icon
01002       CreateDestroyMouseRegionForNewMailIcon( );
01003 
01004       //DEF: Added to Init things in various laptop pages
01005       EnterLaptopInitLaptopPages();
01006       InitalizeSubSitesList( );
01007 
01008       fShowAtmPanelStartButton = TRUE;
01009 
01010       InvalidateRegion(0,0,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
01011 
01012       return( TRUE );
01013 }
01014 
01015 void ExitLaptop()
01016 {
01017 
01018   // exit is called due to message box, leave
01019       if( fExitDueToMessageBox )
01020       {
01021             fExitDueToMessageBox = FALSE;
01022             return;
01023       }
01024 
01025   if ( DidGameJustStart() )
01026   {
01027         SetMusicMode( MUSIC_LAPTOP );
01028   }
01029   else
01030   {
01031         // Restore to old stuff...
01032         SetMusicMode( MUSIC_RESTORE);
01033   }
01034 
01035       // Start ambients...
01036       BuildDayAmbientSounds( );
01037 
01038       // WANNE 2: disabled rain sound when laptop is displayed
01039       //if its raining, start the rain showers
01040       //if( IsItRaining() )
01041       //{
01042       //    //Raise the volume to where it was
01043       //    guiRainLoop = PlayJA2Ambient( RAIN_1, MIDVOLUME, 0 );
01044       //}
01045 
01046       // release cursor
01047       FreeMouseCursor( );
01048 
01049       // set the fact we are currently not in laptop, for rendering purposes
01050       fCurrentlyInLaptop = FALSE;
01051 
01052 
01053       //Deallocate, save data -- leaving laptop.
01054   SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
01055 
01056       if( fExitDuringLoad == FALSE )
01057       {
01058             ExitLaptopMode(guiCurrentLaptopMode);
01059       }
01060       
01061       fExitDuringLoad = FALSE;
01062       fLoadPendingFlag = FALSE;
01063 
01064 
01065       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiLAPTOP);
01066   DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiLaptopBACKGROUND);
01067       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiTITLEBARLAPTOP );
01068       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiLIGHTS );
01069   DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiTITLEBARICONS );
01070       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiEmailWarning );
01071 
01072       // destroy region for new mail icon
01073       CreateDestroyMouseRegionForNewMailIcon( );
01074 
01075       // get rid of desktop
01076       DeleteDesktopBackground(  );
01077 
01078   if(fErrorFlag)
01079       {
01080    fErrorFlag=FALSE;
01081        CreateDestroyErrorButton();
01082       }     
01083       if(fDeleteMailFlag)
01084       {
01085        fDeleteMailFlag=FALSE;
01086        CreateDestroyDeleteNoticeMailButton();
01087       } 
01088       if(fNewMailFlag)
01089       {
01090        fNewMailFlag=FALSE;
01091    CreateDestroyNewMailButton();
01092       }
01093 
01094 
01095       // get rid of minize button
01096       CreateDestroyMinimizeButtonForCurrentMode( );
01097 
01098       
01099 
01100       //MSYS_SetCurrentCursor(CURSOR_NORMAL);
01101       gfEnterLapTop=TRUE;
01102       DeleteLapTopButtons();
01103   DeleteLapTopMouseRegions();
01104       // restore tactical buttons
01105   //CreateCurrentTacticalPanelButtons();
01106       gfShowBookmarks=FALSE;
01107       CreateDestoryBookMarkRegions( );
01108 
01109   fNewWWW=TRUE;
01110   RemoveBookmark(-2);
01111       DeleteBookmark( );
01112       //DeleteBookmarkRegions();
01113   DeleteLoadPending( );
01114       fReDrawNewMailFlag = FALSE;
01115 
01116       //Since we are going to MapScreen, check the flag
01117       guiTacticalInterfaceFlags |= INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN;
01118 
01119       //close the laptop library
01120 //    CloseLibrary( LIBRARY_LAPTOP );
01121       //pause the game because we dont want time to advance in the laptop
01122       UnPauseGame();
01123 
01124 }
01125 
01126 void
01127 RenderLapTopImage()
01128 {
01129   HVOBJECT hLapTopHandle;
01130       
01131   
01132       if( ( fMaximizingProgram == TRUE ) ||( fMinizingProgram == TRUE) )
01133       {
01134             return;
01135       }
01136 
01137       GetVideoObject(&hLapTopHandle, guiLAPTOP);
01138   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopHandle, 0,LAPTOP_X, LAPTOP_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01139       
01140       
01141       GetVideoObject(&hLapTopHandle, guiLaptopBACKGROUND);
01142   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopHandle, 1,iScreenWidthOffset + 25, iScreenHeightOffset + 23, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);    
01143       
01144 
01145       MarkButtonsDirty( );
01146  
01147 }
01148 void RenderLaptop()
01149 {
01150       UINT32 uiTempMode = 0;
01151 
01152       if( ( fMaximizingProgram == TRUE ) ||( fMinizingProgram == TRUE) )
01153       {
01154             gfShowBookmarks = FALSE;
01155             return;
01156       }
01157 
01158       if(fLoadPendingFlag)
01159       {
01160             uiTempMode = guiCurrentLaptopMode;
01161             guiCurrentLaptopMode = guiPreviousLaptopMode;
01162       }
01163       
01164       switch( guiCurrentLaptopMode )
01165       {
01166             case( LAPTOP_MODE_NONE ):
01167               DrawDeskTopBackground( );   
01168             break;
01169             case LAPTOP_MODE_AIM:
01170               RenderAIM();
01171                   break;
01172             case LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS:
01173                   RenderAIMMembers();
01174                   break;
01175             case LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS_FACIAL_INDEX:
01176                   RenderAimFacialIndex();
01177                   break;
01178             case LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS_SORTED_FILES:
01179                   RenderAimSort();
01180                   break;
01181             case LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS_ARCHIVES:
01182                   RenderAimArchives();
01183                   break;
01184             case LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_POLICIES:
01185                   RenderAimPolicies();
01186                   break;
01187             case LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_LINKS:
01188                   RenderAimLinks();
01189                   break;
01190             case LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_HISTORY:
01191                   RenderAimHistory();
01192                   break;
01193             case LAPTOP_MODE_MERC:
01194                   RenderMercs();
01195                   break;
01196             case LAPTOP_MODE_MERC_FILES:
01197                   RenderMercsFiles();
01198                   break;
01199             case LAPTOP_MODE_MERC_ACCOUNT:
01200                   RenderMercsAccount();
01201                   break;
01202             case LAPTOP_MODE_MERC_NO_ACCOUNT:
01203                   RenderMercsNoAccount();
01204                   break;
01205 
01206             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R:
01207                   RenderBobbyR();
01208                   break;
01209 
01210             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_GUNS:
01211                   RenderBobbyRGuns();
01212                   break;
01213             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_AMMO:
01214                   RenderBobbyRAmmo();
01215                   break;
01216             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_ARMOR:
01217                   RenderBobbyRArmour();
01218                   break;
01219             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_MISC:
01220                   RenderBobbyRMisc();
01221                   break;
01222             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_USED:
01223                   RenderBobbyRUsed();
01224                   break;
01225             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_MAILORDER:
01226                   RenderBobbyRMailOrder();
01227                   break;
01228             case LAPTOP_MODE_CHAR_PROFILE:
01229                   RenderCharProfile();
01230                   break;
01231             case LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST:
01232                   RenderFlorist();
01233                   break;
01234             case LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST_FLOWER_GALLERY:
01235                   RenderFloristGallery();
01236                   break;
01237             case LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST_ORDERFORM:
01238                   RenderFloristOrderForm();
01239                   break;
01240             case LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST_CARD_GALLERY:
01241                   RenderFloristCards();
01242                   break;
01243 
01244             case LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE:
01245                   RenderInsurance();
01246                   break;
01247 
01248             case LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE_INFO:
01249                   RenderInsuranceInfo();
01250                   break;
01251 
01252             case LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE_CONTRACT:
01253                   RenderInsuranceContract();
01254                   break;
01255 
01256             case LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE_COMMENTS:
01257                   RenderInsuranceComments();
01258                   break;
01259 
01260             case LAPTOP_MODE_FUNERAL:
01261                   RenderFuneral();
01262                   break;
01263             case LAPTOP_MODE_SIRTECH:
01264                   RenderSirTech();
01265                   break;
01266             case LAPTOP_MODE_FINANCES:
01267                   RenderFinances();
01268                   break;
01269             case LAPTOP_MODE_PERSONNEL:
01270                   RenderPersonnel();
01271                   break;
01272             case LAPTOP_MODE_HISTORY:
01273                   RenderHistory();
01274                   break;
01275             case LAPTOP_MODE_FILES:
01276                   RenderFiles();
01277                   break;
01278             case LAPTOP_MODE_EMAIL:
01279                   RenderEmail();
01280                   break;
01281             case( LAPTOP_MODE_WWW ):
01282                   DrawDeskTopBackground( );
01283                   RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
01284             break;
01285             case( LAPTOP_MODE_BROKEN_LINK ):
01286                   RenderBrokenLink();
01287             break;
01288 
01289             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBYR_SHIPMENTS:
01290                   RenderBobbyRShipments();
01291                   break;
01292       
01293 
01294       }
01295 
01296 
01297 
01298       if( guiCurrentLaptopMode >= LAPTOP_MODE_WWW )
01299       {
01300             // render program bar for www program
01301             RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
01302       }
01303 
01304       
01305 
01306       if(fLoadPendingFlag)
01307       {
01308             guiCurrentLaptopMode  =  uiTempMode;
01309             return;
01310       }
01311   
01312       DisplayProgramBoundingBox( FALSE );
01313       
01314       // mark the buttons dirty at this point
01315   MarkButtonsDirty( );
01316 }
01317 
01318 void EnterNewLaptopMode()
01319 {
01320       static BOOLEAN fOldLoadFlag=FALSE;
01321 
01322             
01323       if( fExitingLaptopFlag )
01324       {
01325             return;
01326       }
01327       // cause flicker, as we are going to a new program/WEB page
01328       fFlickerHD = TRUE;
01329 
01330       // handle maximizing of programs
01331   switch( guiCurrentLaptopMode )
01332       {
01333             case ( LAPTOP_MODE_EMAIL ):
01334              if( gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MAILER ] == LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MINIMIZED )
01335              {
01336                    // minized, maximized
01337                    if(  fMaximizingProgram == FALSE )
01338                    {
01339                      fInitTitle = TRUE;
01340                      InitTitleBarMaximizeGraphics(guiTITLEBARLAPTOP, pLaptopTitles[ 0 ], guiTITLEBARICONS, 0 );
01341                      ExitLaptopMode(guiPreviousLaptopMode);
01342                         
01343                    }
01344                    fMaximizingProgram = TRUE;
01345                    bProgramBeingMaximized = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MAILER;
01346                    gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MAILER ] = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_OPEN;
01347                    
01348        return; 
01349              }
01350             break;
01351             case ( LAPTOP_MODE_FILES ):
01352              if( gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_FILES ] == LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MINIMIZED )
01353              {
01354                    // minized, maximized
01355                    if(  fMaximizingProgram == FALSE )
01356                    {
01357                      fInitTitle = TRUE;
01358                      InitTitleBarMaximizeGraphics(guiTITLEBARLAPTOP, pLaptopTitles[ 1 ], guiTITLEBARICONS, 2 );
01359                      ExitLaptopMode(guiPreviousLaptopMode);
01360                          
01361                    }
01362 
01363                    // minized, maximized
01364                    fMaximizingProgram = TRUE;
01365                    bProgramBeingMaximized = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_FILES;
01366                    gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_FILES ] = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_OPEN;
01367                    return; 
01368              }
01369             break;
01370             case ( LAPTOP_MODE_PERSONNEL ):
01371              if( gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_PERSONNEL ] == LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MINIMIZED )
01372              {
01373 
01374                    // minized, maximized
01375                    if(  fMaximizingProgram == FALSE )
01376                    {
01377                      fInitTitle = TRUE;
01378                      InitTitleBarMaximizeGraphics(guiTITLEBARLAPTOP, pLaptopTitles[ 2 ], guiTITLEBARICONS, 3 );
01379                      ExitLaptopMode(guiPreviousLaptopMode);
01380                          
01381                    }
01382 
01383                    // minized, maximized
01384                    fMaximizingProgram = TRUE;
01385                    bProgramBeingMaximized = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_PERSONNEL;
01386                    gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_PERSONNEL ] = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_OPEN;
01387                    return; 
01388              }
01389             break;
01390             case ( LAPTOP_MODE_FINANCES ):
01391              if( gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_FINANCES ] == LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MINIMIZED )
01392              {
01393 
01394                    // minized, maximized
01395                    if(  fMaximizingProgram == FALSE )
01396                    {
01397                      fInitTitle = TRUE;
01398                      InitTitleBarMaximizeGraphics(guiTITLEBARLAPTOP, pLaptopTitles[ 3 ], guiTITLEBARICONS, 5 );
01399                      ExitLaptopMode(guiPreviousLaptopMode);
01400                         
01401 
01402                    }
01403 
01404                    // minized, maximized
01405                    fMaximizingProgram = TRUE;
01406                    bProgramBeingMaximized = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_FINANCES;
01407                    gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_FINANCES ] = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_OPEN;
01408                    return; 
01409              }
01410             break;
01411             case ( LAPTOP_MODE_HISTORY ):
01412              if( gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_HISTORY ] == LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MINIMIZED )
01413              {
01414                    // minized, maximized
01415                    if(  fMaximizingProgram == FALSE )
01416                    {
01417                      fInitTitle = TRUE;
01418                      InitTitleBarMaximizeGraphics(guiTITLEBARLAPTOP, pLaptopTitles[ 4 ], guiTITLEBARICONS, 4 );
01419                      ExitLaptopMode(guiPreviousLaptopMode);
01420                          
01421 
01422                    }
01423                    // minized, maximized
01424                    fMaximizingProgram = TRUE;
01425                    bProgramBeingMaximized = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_HISTORY;
01426                    gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_HISTORY ] = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_OPEN;
01427                    return; 
01428              }
01429             break;
01430             case( LAPTOP_MODE_NONE ):
01431               // do nothing
01432             break;
01433             default:
01434              if( gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_WEB_BROWSER ] == LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MINIMIZED )
01435              {
01436                    // minized, maximized
01437                    if(  fMaximizingProgram == FALSE )
01438                    {
01439                      fInitTitle = TRUE;
01440                      InitTitleBarMaximizeGraphics(guiTITLEBARLAPTOP, pWebTitle[ 0 ], guiTITLEBARICONS, 1 );
01441                      ExitLaptopMode(guiPreviousLaptopMode);
01442                    }
01443                    // minized, maximized
01444                    fMaximizingProgram = TRUE;
01445                    bProgramBeingMaximized = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_WEB_BROWSER;
01446                    gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_WEB_BROWSER ] = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_OPEN;
01447                    return; 
01448              }
01449             break;
01450 
01451       }
01452 
01453       if( ( fMaximizingProgram == TRUE ) ||( fMinizingProgram == TRUE) )
01454       {
01455             return;
01456       }
01457 
01458       if((fOldLoadFlag)&&(!fLoadPendingFlag))
01459       {
01460         fOldLoadFlag=FALSE;
01461       }
01462   else if((fLoadPendingFlag)&&(!fOldLoadFlag))
01463   {
01464     ExitLaptopMode(guiPreviousLaptopMode);
01465             fOldLoadFlag=TRUE;
01466             return;
01467       }
01468       else if((fOldLoadFlag)&&(fLoadPendingFlag))
01469       {
01470             return;
01471       }
01472       else
01473       {
01474             // do not exit previous mode if coming from sliding bar handler
01475             if( ( fEnteredNewLapTopDueToHandleSlidingBars == FALSE ) )
01476             {
01477       ExitLaptopMode(guiPreviousLaptopMode);
01478             }
01479       }
01480 
01481 
01482 
01483       if((guiCurrentWWWMode==LAPTOP_MODE_NONE)&&(guiCurrentLaptopMode >=LAPTOP_MODE_WWW))
01484       {
01485    RenderLapTopImage();
01486        giCurrentRegion=WWW_REGION;
01487    RestoreOldRegion(giOldRegion);
01488        guiCurrentLaptopMode =LAPTOP_MODE_WWW;
01489    HighLightRegion(giCurrentRegion);
01490       }
01491       else
01492       {
01493        if( guiCurrentLaptopMode > LAPTOP_MODE_WWW)
01494        {
01495              if(guiPreviousLaptopMode < LAPTOP_MODE_WWW )
01496                    guiCurrentLaptopMode = guiCurrentWWWMode;
01497              else
01498              {
01499                     guiCurrentWWWMode = guiCurrentLaptopMode;
01500                     giCurrentSubPage =0;
01501              }
01502         }
01503       }
01504 
01505       if( guiCurrentLaptopMode >= LAPTOP_MODE_WWW )
01506       {
01507             RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
01508       }
01509 
01510 
01511 
01512       if( ( guiCurrentLaptopMode >= LAPTOP_MODE_WWW ) &&( guiPreviousLaptopMode >= LAPTOP_MODE_WWW ) )
01513       {
01514         gfShowBookmarks = FALSE;
01515       }
01516 
01517       
01518 
01519       //Initialize the new mode.
01520       switch( guiCurrentLaptopMode )
01521       {
01522 
01523             case LAPTOP_MODE_AIM:
01524                   EnterAIM();
01525                   break;
01526             case LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS:
01527                   EnterAIMMembers();
01528                   break;
01529             case LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS_FACIAL_INDEX:
01530                   EnterAimFacialIndex();
01531                   break;
01532             case LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS_SORTED_FILES:
01533                   EnterAimSort();
01534                   break;
01535 
01536             case LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS_ARCHIVES:
01537                   EnterAimArchives();
01538                   break;
01539             case LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_POLICIES:
01540                   EnterAimPolicies();
01541                   break;
01542             case LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_LINKS:
01543                   EnterAimLinks();
01544                   break;
01545             case LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_HISTORY:
01546                   EnterAimHistory();
01547                   break;
01548 
01549             case LAPTOP_MODE_MERC:
01550                   EnterMercs();
01551                   break;
01552             case LAPTOP_MODE_MERC_FILES:
01553                   EnterMercsFiles();
01554                   break;
01555             case LAPTOP_MODE_MERC_ACCOUNT:
01556                   EnterMercsAccount();
01557                   break;
01558             case LAPTOP_MODE_MERC_NO_ACCOUNT:
01559                   EnterMercsNoAccount();
01560                   break;
01561 
01562             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R:
01563                   EnterBobbyR();
01564                   break;
01565             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_GUNS:
01566                   EnterBobbyRGuns();
01567                   break;
01568             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_AMMO:
01569                   EnterBobbyRAmmo();
01570                   break;
01571             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_ARMOR:
01572                   EnterBobbyRArmour();
01573                   break;
01574             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_MISC:
01575                   EnterBobbyRMisc();
01576                   break;
01577             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_USED:
01578                   EnterBobbyRUsed();
01579                   break;
01580             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_MAILORDER:
01581                   EnterBobbyRMailOrder();
01582                   break;
01583             case LAPTOP_MODE_CHAR_PROFILE:
01584                   EnterCharProfile();
01585                   break;
01586 
01587             case LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST:
01588                   EnterFlorist();
01589                   break;
01590             case LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST_FLOWER_GALLERY:
01591                   EnterFloristGallery();
01592                   break;
01593             case LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST_ORDERFORM:
01594                   EnterFloristOrderForm();
01595                   break;
01596             case LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST_CARD_GALLERY:
01597                   EnterFloristCards();
01598                   break;
01599 
01600             case LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE:
01601                   EnterInsurance();
01602                   break;
01603             case LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE_INFO:
01604                   EnterInsuranceInfo();
01605                   break;
01606             case LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE_CONTRACT:
01607                   EnterInsuranceContract();
01608                   break;
01609             case LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE_COMMENTS:
01610                   EnterInsuranceComments();
01611                   break;
01612 
01613             case LAPTOP_MODE_FUNERAL:
01614                   EnterFuneral();
01615                   break;
01616             case LAPTOP_MODE_SIRTECH:
01617                   EnterSirTech();
01618                   break;
01619             case LAPTOP_MODE_FINANCES:
01620                   EnterFinances();
01621                   break;
01622             case LAPTOP_MODE_PERSONNEL:
01623                   EnterPersonnel();
01624                   break;
01625             case LAPTOP_MODE_HISTORY:
01626                   EnterHistory();
01627                   break;
01628             case LAPTOP_MODE_FILES:
01629                   EnterFiles();
01630                   break;
01631             case LAPTOP_MODE_EMAIL:
01632                   EnterEmail();
01633                   break;
01634             case LAPTOP_MODE_BROKEN_LINK:
01635                   EnterBrokenLink();
01636             break;
01637             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBYR_SHIPMENTS:
01638                   EnterBobbyRShipments();
01639                   break;
01640 
01641       }
01642       
01643       // first time using webbrowser in this laptop session
01644       if( ( fFirstTimeInLaptop == TRUE ) && ( guiCurrentLaptopMode >=LAPTOP_MODE_WWW ) )
01645       {
01646             // show bookmarks
01647             gfShowBookmarks = TRUE;
01648 
01649             // reset flag 
01650             fFirstTimeInLaptop = FALSE;
01651       }
01652 
01653   if( ( !fLoadPendingFlag) )
01654       {
01655         CreateDestroyMinimizeButtonForCurrentMode( );
01656             guiPreviousLaptopMode = guiCurrentLaptopMode;
01657             SetSubSiteAsVisted( );
01658       }
01659 
01660       DisplayProgramBoundingBox( TRUE );
01661 
01662       
01663       // check to see if we need to go to there default web page of not
01664   //HandleDefaultWebpageForLaptop( );
01665 }
01666 
01667 void HandleLapTopHandles()
01668 {

01670             return;

01675       }
01676 
01677

01680

01684                   break;

01807 
01808 extern BOOLEAN gfPrintFrameBuffer;
01809 
01810 // WANNE 2 <change laptop zooming>
01811 UINT32 LaptopScreenHandle()
01812 {
01813       INT16 sYOffset = 0;
01814       INT16 sXOffset = 0;
01815 
01816       //User just changed modes.  This is determined by the button callbacks 
01817       //created in LaptopScreenInit()
01818 
01819       // Correct the minor cosmetic bug (laptop zooming start not correct)
01820       if (iResolution == 0)
01821       {
01822             sXOffset = -2;
01823             sYOffset = -2;
01824       }
01825       else if (iResolution == 1)
01826       {
01827             sYOffset = -1;
01828       }
01829       else if (iResolution == 2)
01830       {
01831             sXOffset = 2;
01832             sYOffset = 1;
01833       }
01834 
01835       // Set mouse region values
01836       LaptopScreenRect.iLeft = LAPTOP_UL_X;
01837       LaptopScreenRect.iTop = LAPTOP_UL_Y - 5;
01838       LaptopScreenRect.iRight = LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X + 2;
01839       LaptopScreenRect.iBottom = LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_Y + 5 + 19;
01840 
01841       // just entered
01842       if(gfEnterLapTop)
01843       {
01844        EnterLaptop();
01845        CreateLaptopButtons();
01846    gfEnterLapTop=FALSE;
01847       }
01848 
01849       if( gfStartMapScreenToLaptopTransition )
01850       { 
01851             //Everything is set up to start the transition animation.
01852             //SGPRect SrcRect1; 
01853             SGPRect SrcRect2, DstRect;
01854             INT32 iPercentage, iScalePercentage, iFactor;
01855             UINT32 uiStartTime, uiTimeRange, uiCurrTime;
01856             INT32 iX, iY, iWidth, iHeight;
01857             INT32 iLaptopMonitorCenterX, iLaptopMonitorCenterY;
01858 
01859             INT32 iRealPercentage;
01860 
01861             SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );
01862             //Step 1:  Build the laptop image into the save buffer.
01863             gfStartMapScreenToLaptopTransition = FALSE;
01864             RestoreBackgroundRects();
01865             RenderLapTopImage();
01866             HighLightRegion(giCurrentRegion);
01867             RenderLaptop();
01868             RenderButtons();
01869             PrintDate( );
01870             PrintBalance( );
01871             PrintNumberOnTeam( );
01872             ShowLights();
01873 
01874             //Step 2:  The mapscreen image is in the EXTRABUFFER, and laptop is in the SAVEBUFFER
01875             //         Start transitioning the screen.
01876             DstRect.iLeft =   iScreenWidthOffset;                                   //0
01877             DstRect.iTop =    iScreenHeightOffset;                                  //0
01878             DstRect.iRight = iScreenWidthOffset + 640;                        //640
01879             DstRect.iBottom = iScreenHeightOffset + 480;                      //480
01880             iLaptopMonitorCenterX = SCREEN_WIDTH - 184 + 19 + sXOffset;
01881             iLaptopMonitorCenterY = SCREEN_HEIGHT - 70 + 16 + sYOffset;       // WANNE 2
01882             uiTimeRange = 1000;
01883             iPercentage = iRealPercentage = 0;
01884             uiStartTime = GetJA2Clock();
01885 
01886             BlitBufferToBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, iScreenWidthOffset, iScreenHeightOffset,
01887                   640, 480 );
01888             // Lesh: moved into loop
01889             //BlitBufferToBuffer( guiEXTRABUFFER, FRAME_BUFFER, iScreenWidthOffset, iScreenHeightOffset,
01890             //    SCREEN_WIDTH - iScreenWidthOffset, SCREEN_HEIGHT - iScreenHeightOffset );
01891 
01892             PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "SOUNDS\\Laptop power up (8-11).wav", RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
01893             
01894             // WANNE 2 with laptop zooming
01895             while( iRealPercentage < 100  )
01896             {
01897                   // Lesh: restore mapscreen so laptop zooming won't leave "graphical trail
01898                   BlitBufferToBuffer( guiEXTRABUFFER, FRAME_BUFFER, iScreenWidthOffset, iScreenHeightOffset,
01899                         SCREEN_WIDTH - iScreenWidthOffset, SCREEN_HEIGHT - iScreenHeightOffset );
01900 
01901                   uiCurrTime = GetJA2Clock();
01902                   iPercentage = (uiCurrTime-uiStartTime) * 100 / uiTimeRange;
01903                   iPercentage = min( iPercentage, 100 );
01904 
01905                   iRealPercentage = iPercentage;
01906 
01907                   //Factor the percentage so that it is modified by a gravity falling acceleration effect.
01908                   iFactor = (iPercentage - 50) * 2;
01909                   if( iPercentage < 50 )
01910                         iPercentage = (UINT32)(iPercentage + iPercentage * iFactor * 0.01 + 0.5);
01911                   else
01912                         iPercentage = (UINT32)(iPercentage + (100-iPercentage) * iFactor * 0.01 + 0.5);
01913 
01914                   //Laptop source rect
01915                   if( iPercentage < 99 )
01916                         iScalePercentage = 10000 / (100-iPercentage);
01917                   else
01918                         iScalePercentage = 5333;
01919                   iWidth = 12 * iScalePercentage / 100;
01920                   iHeight = 9 * iScalePercentage / 100;
01921 
01922                   iX = iLaptopMonitorCenterX - (iLaptopMonitorCenterX - (iScreenWidthOffset + 320)) * iScalePercentage / 5333;
01923                   iY = iLaptopMonitorCenterY - (iLaptopMonitorCenterY - (iScreenHeightOffset + 240)) * iScalePercentage / 5333;
01924 
01925                   SrcRect2.iLeft = iX - iWidth / 2;
01926                   SrcRect2.iRight = SrcRect2.iLeft + iWidth;
01927                   SrcRect2.iTop = iY - iHeight / 2;
01928                   SrcRect2.iBottom = SrcRect2.iTop + iHeight;
01929                   
01930                   BltStretchVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, iScreenWidthOffset, iScreenHeightOffset, 0, &DstRect, &SrcRect2 );
01931 
01932                    //WANNE 2
01933                   InvalidateScreen();
01934                   
01935                    //WANNE 2
01936                   RefreshScreen( NULL );
01937             }
01938 
01939             fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
01940       }
01941       
01942 
01943       //DO NOT MOVE THIS FUNCTION CALL!!!
01944       
01945       //This determines if the help screen should be active
01946       if( ShouldTheHelpScreenComeUp( HELP_SCREEN_LAPTOP, FALSE ) )
01947       {
01948             // handle the help screen
01949             HelpScreenHandler();
01950             return( LAPTOP_SCREEN ); 
01951       }
01952 
01953       RestoreBackgroundRects();
01954 
01955       // lock cursor to screen
01956       RestrictMouseCursor( &LaptopScreenRect );
01957       
01958       
01959 
01960       // handle animated cursors
01961       HandleAnimatedCursors( );
01962       // Deque all game events
01963       DequeAllGameEvents( TRUE );
01964 
01965       // handle sub sites..like BR Guns, BR Ammo, Armour, Misc...for WW Wait..since they are not true sub pages
01966       // and are not individual sites
01967       HandleWWWSubSites( );
01968       UpdateStatusOfDisplayingBookMarks( );
01969 
01970       // check if we need to reset new WWW mode
01971       CheckIfNewWWWW( );
01972 
01973       if( guiCurrentLaptopMode != guiPreviousLaptopMode )
01974       {
01975             if( guiCurrentLaptopMode <=LAPTOP_MODE_WWW )
01976             {
01977                   fLoadPendingFlag=FALSE;
01978             }
01979                   
01980             if( ( fMaximizingProgram == FALSE ) && ( fMinizingProgram == FALSE ) )
01981             {
01982                   if( guiCurrentLaptopMode <= LAPTOP_MODE_WWW )
01983                   {
01984                         EnterNewLaptopMode();
01985                         if( ( fMaximizingProgram == FALSE ) && ( fMinizingProgram == FALSE ) )
01986                         {
01987                               guiPreviousLaptopMode = guiCurrentLaptopMode;
01988                         }
01989                   }
01990           else
01991                   {  
01992                          if(!fLoadPendingFlag)
01993                          {
01994                               EnterNewLaptopMode();
01995                               guiPreviousLaptopMode = guiCurrentLaptopMode;
01996                          }
01997                   }
01998             }
01999   }
02000 
02001       if( fPausedReDrawScreenFlag )
02002       {
02003             fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
02004             fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = FALSE;
02005       }
02006       
02007       // WANNE 2 <redraw>
02008   if( fReDrawScreenFlag )
02009       {
02010    RenderLapTopImage();
02011        HighLightRegion(giCurrentRegion);
02012        RenderLaptop(); 
02013    
02014       }
02015   
02016 
02017       // are we about to leave laptop
02018       if( fExitingLaptopFlag )
02019       {
02020             if( fLoadPendingFlag == TRUE )
02021             {
02022               fLoadPendingFlag = FALSE;
02023               fExitDuringLoad = TRUE;
02024             }
02025             LeaveLapTopScreen( );
02026       }
02027       
02028       if( fExitingLaptopFlag == FALSE )
02029       {
02030         // handle handles for laptop input stream
02031         HandleLapTopHandles();
02032       }
02033 
02034       // get keyboard input, handle it
02035       GetLaptopKeyboardInput();
02036 
02037       
02038 
02039 
02040       
02041       // check to see if new mail box needs to be displayed
02042       DisplayNewMailBox( );
02043   CreateDestroyNewMailButton( );
02044 
02045       // create various mouse regions that are global to laptop system
02046   CreateDestoryBookMarkRegions( );
02047       CreateDestroyErrorButton( );
02048       
02049       // check to see if error box needs to be displayed
02050       DisplayErrorBox();
02051 
02052       // check to see if buttons marked dirty
02053   CheckMarkButtonsDirtyFlag( );
02054   
02055   // check to see if new mail box needs to be displayed
02056       ShouldNewMailBeDisplayed();
02057       
02058       // check to see if new mail box needs to be displayed
02059       ReDrawNewMailBox( );
02060 
02061       
02062       // look for unread email
02063       LookForUnread();
02064       //Handle keyboard shortcuts...
02065  
02066       // mouse regions
02067   //HandleLapTopScreenMouseUi(); 
02068   //RenderButtons();
02069       //RenderButtonsFastHelp( );
02070 
02071   
02072   
02073       if( ( fLoadPendingFlag == FALSE )||( fNewMailFlag  ) )
02074       {
02075         // render buttons marked dirty    
02076         RenderButtons( ); 
02077       
02078     // render fast help 'quick created' buttons
02079 //          RenderFastHelp( );
02080 //      RenderButtonsFastHelp( );
02081   }
02082 
02083       // show text on top of buttons
02084       if( ( fMaximizingProgram == FALSE ) && ( fMinizingProgram == FALSE ) )
02085       {
02086         DrawButtonText();
02087       }
02088 
02089 
02090       // check to see if bookmarks need to be displayed
02091       if(gfShowBookmarks)
02092       {
02093             if( fExitingLaptopFlag )
02094                   gfShowBookmarks = FALSE;
02095             else
02096                   DisplayBookMarks();
02097       }
02098 
02099       // check to see if laod pending flag is set
02100       DisplayLoadPending( );
02101 
02102       // check if we are showing message?
02103       DisplayWebBookMarkNotify( );
02104 
02105       if( ( fIntermediateReDrawFlag )||( fReDrawPostButtonRender ) )
02106       {
02107         // rendering AFTER buttons and button text
02108             if( ( fMaximizingProgram == FALSE ) && ( fMinizingProgram == FALSE ) )
02109             {
02110               PostButtonRendering( );
02111             }
02112   }
02113       //PrintBalance( );
02114 
02115       PrintDate( );
02116 
02117       PrintBalance( );
02118 
02119       PrintNumberOnTeam( );
02120       DisplayTaskBarIcons();
02121 
02122       // handle if we are maximizing a program from a minimized state or vice versa
02123       HandleSlidingTitleBar( );
02124 
02125 
02126       // flicker HD light as nessacary
02127       FlickerHDLight( );
02128 
02129       // display power and HD lights
02130       ShowLights( );
02131       
02132 
02133       // render frame rate
02134       DisplayFrameRate( );
02135       
02136       // WANNE 2 <redraw>
02137       // invalidate screen if redrawn
02138       if( fReDrawScreenFlag == TRUE )
02139       {
02140             InvalidateRegion(0,0,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
02141     fReDrawScreenFlag = FALSE;
02142       }
02143 
02144       ExecuteVideoOverlays();
02145 
02146       SaveBackgroundRects( );
02147 //    RenderButtonsFastHelp();
02148       RenderFastHelp( );
02149 
02150   // ex SAVEBUFFER queue
02151       ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue();
02152       ResetInterface();
02153       EndFrameBufferRender( );
02154       return (LAPTOP_SCREEN); 
02155 }

02163 {
02164       
02165       return 0; 
02166 }

02169 UINT32 ExitLaptopMode(UINT32 uiMode)
02170 {
02171             //Deallocate the previous mode that you were in.
02172       
02173       switch( uiMode )
02174       {
02175             case LAPTOP_MODE_AIM:
02176                   ExitAIM();
02177                   break;
02178             case LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS:
02179                   ExitAIMMembers();
02180                   break;

02182                   ExitAimFacialIndex();
02183                   break;
02184             case LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS_SORTED_FILES:
02185                   ExitAimSort();
02186                   break;

02188                   ExitAimArchives();
02189                   break;

02191                   ExitAimPolicies();
02192                   break;
02193             case LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_LINKS:
02194                   ExitAimLinks();
02195                   break;
02196             case LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_HISTORY:
02197                   ExitAimHistory();
02198                   break;
02199 
02200             case LAPTOP_MODE_MERC:
02201                   ExitMercs();
02202                   break;
02203             case LAPTOP_MODE_MERC_FILES:
02204                   ExitMercsFiles();
02205                   break;
02206             case LAPTOP_MODE_MERC_ACCOUNT:
02207                   ExitMercsAccount();
02208                   break;
02209             case LAPTOP_MODE_MERC_NO_ACCOUNT:
02210                   ExitMercsNoAccount();
02211                   break;
02212 
02213             
02214             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R:
02215                   ExitBobbyR();
02216                   break;
02217             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_GUNS:
02218                   ExitBobbyRGuns();
02219                   break;
02220             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_AMMO:
02221                   ExitBobbyRAmmo();
02222                   break;
02223             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_ARMOR:
02224                   ExitBobbyRArmour();
02225                   break;
02226             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_MISC:
02227                   ExitBobbyRMisc();
02228                   break;
02229             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_USED:
02230                   ExitBobbyRUsed();
02231                   break;
02232             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_MAILORDER:
02233                   ExitBobbyRMailOrder();
02234                   break;
02235 
02236 
02237             case LAPTOP_MODE_CHAR_PROFILE:
02238                   ExitCharProfile();
02239                   break;
02240             case LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST:
02241                   ExitFlorist();
02242                   break;
02243             case LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST_FLOWER_GALLERY:
02244                   ExitFloristGallery();
02245                   break;
02246             case LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST_ORDERFORM:
02247                   ExitFloristOrderForm();
02248                   break;

02250                   ExitFloristCards();
02251                   break;

02254                   ExitInsurance();
02255                   break;
02256 
02257             case LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE_INFO:
02258                   ExitInsuranceInfo();
02259                   break;
02260 
02261             case LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE_CONTRACT:
02262                   ExitInsuranceContract();
02263                   break;
02264             case LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE_COMMENTS:
02265                   ExitInsuranceComments();
02266                   break;

02273                   break;

02282                   break;

02295                   break;

02424 void
02425 DeleteLapTopButtons()
02426 {
02427       UINT32 cnt;
02428 
02429       for( cnt = 0; cnt < 7; cnt++ )
02430       {           
02431             RemoveButton( gLaptopButton[ cnt ] );
02432             UnloadButtonImage( gLaptopButtonImage[ cnt ] );
02433       }
02434 }
02435 
02436 
02437 void 
02438 BtnOnCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
02439 {
02440       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
02441             return; 
02442       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02443       {
02444        if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
02445         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON); 
02446         InvalidateRegion(0,0,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
02447     
02448       }
02449       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02450   {
02451    if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
02452             {
02453              if ( HandleExit( ) )
02454              {
02455 //                 btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
02456                    fExitingLaptopFlag = TRUE;
02457                    InvalidateRegion(0,0,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
02458              }
02459         }
02460        btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
02461       }
02462 
02463 } 
02464 
02465 BOOLEAN LeaveLapTopScreen( void )
02466 {
02467       INT16 sYOffset = 0;
02468       INT16 sXOffset = 0;
02469 
02470       // Correct the minor cosmetic bug (laptop zooming start not correct)
02471       if (iResolution == 0)
02472       {
02473             sXOffset = -2;
02474             sYOffset = -2;
02475       }
02476       else if (iResolution == 1)
02477       {
02478             sYOffset = -1;
02479       }
02480       else if (iResolution == 2)
02481       {
02482             sXOffset = 2;
02483             sYOffset = 1;
02484       }
02485       
02486       if( ExitLaptopDone( ) )
02487       {
02488             SetLaptopExitScreen( MAP_SCREEN );
02489 
02490             if( gfAtLeastOneMercWasHired == TRUE )
02491             {
02492                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.gfNewGameLaptop )
02493                   {
02494                         LaptopSaveInfo.gfNewGameLaptop = FALSE;
02495                         fExitingLaptopFlag = TRUE;
02496                         InitNewGame( FALSE );
02497                         gfDontStartTransitionFromLaptop = TRUE;
02498                         return( TRUE );
02499                   }
02500             }
02501             else
02502             {
02503                   gfDontStartTransitionFromLaptop = TRUE;
02504             }
02505 
02506         SetPendingNewScreen(guiExitScreen);
02507 
02508             if( !gfDontStartTransitionFromLaptop )
02509             {
02510                   SGPRect SrcRect1, SrcRect2, DstRect;
02511                   INT32 iPercentage, iScalePercentage, iFactor;
02512                   UINT32 uiStartTime, uiTimeRange, uiCurrTime;
02513                   INT32 iX, iY, iWidth, iHeight;
02514                   INT32 iRealPercentage;
02515                   INT32 iLaptopMonitorCenterX, iLaptopMonitorCenterY;
02516 
02517                   gfDontStartTransitionFromLaptop = TRUE;
02518                   SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );
02519                   //Step 1:  Build the laptop image into the save buffer.
02520                   RestoreBackgroundRects();
02521                   RenderLapTopImage();
02522                   HighLightRegion(giCurrentRegion);
02523                   RenderLaptop();
02524                   RenderButtons();
02525                   PrintDate( );
02526                   PrintBalance( );
02527                   PrintNumberOnTeam( );
02528                   ShowLights();
02529 
02530                   //Step 2:  The mapscreen image is in the EXTRABUFFER, and laptop is in the SAVEBUFFER
02531                   //         Start transitioning the screen.
02532                   DstRect.iLeft = iScreenWidthOffset + 0;               // 0
02533                   DstRect.iTop = iScreenHeightOffset + 0;               // 0
02534                   DstRect.iRight = iScreenWidthOffset + 640;            // 640
02535                   DstRect.iBottom = iScreenHeightOffset + 480;          // 480
02536                   iLaptopMonitorCenterX = SCREEN_WIDTH - 184 + 19 + sXOffset;
02537                   iLaptopMonitorCenterY = SCREEN_HEIGHT - 70 + 16 + sYOffset;
02538                   uiTimeRange = 1000;
02539                   iPercentage = iRealPercentage = 100;
02540                   uiStartTime = GetJA2Clock();
02541 
02542                   BlitBufferToBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, iScreenWidthOffset, iScreenHeightOffset,
02543                         640, 480 );
02544 
02545                   PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "SOUNDS\\Laptop power down (8-11).wav", RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
02546 
02547                   // WANNE 2
02548                   while( iRealPercentage > 0  )
02549                   {
02550                         BlitBufferToBuffer( guiEXTRABUFFER, FRAME_BUFFER, iScreenWidthOffset, iScreenHeightOffset,
02551                               SCREEN_WIDTH - iScreenWidthOffset, SCREEN_HEIGHT - iScreenHeightOffset );
02552 
02553                         uiCurrTime = GetJA2Clock();
02554                         iPercentage = (uiCurrTime-uiStartTime) * 100 / uiTimeRange;
02555                         iPercentage = min( iPercentage, 100 );
02556                         iPercentage = 100 - iPercentage;
02557 
02558                         iRealPercentage = iPercentage;
02559 
02560                         //Factor the percentage so that it is modified by a gravity falling acceleration effect.
02561                         iFactor = (iPercentage - 50) * 2;
02562                         if( iPercentage < 50 )
02563                               iPercentage = (UINT32)(iPercentage + iPercentage * iFactor * 0.01 + 0.5);
02564                         else
02565                               iPercentage = (UINT32)(iPercentage + (100-iPercentage) * iFactor * 0.01 + 0.5);
02566 
02567                         //Mapscreen source rect
02568                         SrcRect1.iLeft = iScreenWidthOffset + 464 * iPercentage / 100;
02569                         SrcRect1.iRight = iScreenWidthOffset + 640 - 163 * iPercentage / 100;
02570                         SrcRect1.iTop = iScreenHeightOffset + 417 * iPercentage / 100;
02571                         SrcRect1.iBottom = iScreenHeightOffset + 480 - 55 * iPercentage / 100;
02572                         //Laptop source rect
02573                         if( iPercentage < 99 )
02574                               iScalePercentage = 10000 / (100-iPercentage);
02575                         else
02576                               iScalePercentage = 5333;
02577                         iWidth = 12 * iScalePercentage / 100;
02578                         iHeight = 9 * iScalePercentage / 100;
02579 
02580                         iX = iLaptopMonitorCenterX - (iLaptopMonitorCenterX - (iScreenWidthOffset + 320)) * iScalePercentage / 5333;
02581                         iY = iLaptopMonitorCenterY - (iLaptopMonitorCenterY - (iScreenHeightOffset + 240)) * iScalePercentage / 5333;
02582 
02583                         SrcRect2.iLeft = iX - iWidth / 2;
02584                         SrcRect2.iRight = SrcRect2.iLeft + iWidth;
02585                         SrcRect2.iTop = iY - iHeight / 2;
02586                         SrcRect2.iBottom = SrcRect2.iTop + iHeight;
02587 
02588                         BltStretchVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, iScreenWidthOffset, iScreenHeightOffset, &DstRect, &SrcRect2 );
02589 
02590                         InvalidateScreen();
02591                         //gfPrintFrameBuffer = TRUE;
02592                         RefreshScreen( NULL );
02593                   }
02594             } 
02595       }
02596       return( TRUE );
02597 
02598 }
02599 
02600 
02601 BOOLEAN HandleExit( void )
02602 {
02603 //    static BOOLEAN fSentImpWarningAlready = FALSE;
02604 
02605       
02606       // remind player about IMP
02607       if ( LaptopSaveInfo.gfNewGameLaptop != 0 )
02608       {
02609             if ( !AnyMercsHired( ) )
02610             {
02611                   //AddEmail(0,1, GAME_HELP, GetWorldTotalMin( ) );
02612                   //fExitingLaptopFlag = FALSE;
02613                   //return( FALSE );
02614             }
02615       }
02616 
02617       // new game, send email 
02618       if ( LaptopSaveInfo.gfNewGameLaptop != 0 )
02619       {
02620             // Set an event to send this email ( day 2 8:00-12:00 )
02621             if( ( LaptopSaveInfo.fIMPCompletedFlag == FALSE ) && ( LaptopSaveInfo.fSentImpWarningAlready == FALSE ) )
02622             {
02623                   AddFutureDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_HAVENT_MADE_IMP_CHARACTER_EMAIL, (8 + Random(4) ) * 60, 0, 1 );
02624 
02625 /*
02626  Moved to an event that gets triggered the next day: HaventMadeImpMercEmailCallBack()
02627  
02628                   LaptopSaveInfo.fSentImpWarningAlready = TRUE;
02629                   AddEmail(IMP_EMAIL_AGAIN,IMP_EMAIL_AGAIN_LENGTH,1, GetWorldTotalMin( ) );
02630 */
02631                   fExitingLaptopFlag = TRUE;
02632 
02633               return( FALSE );
02634             }     
02635       }
02636       
02637 
02638       return ( TRUE );
02639 
02640 }
02641 
02642 void HaventMadeImpMercEmailCallBack()
02643 {
02644       //if the player STILL hasnt made an imp merc yet
02645       if( ( LaptopSaveInfo.fIMPCompletedFlag == FALSE ) && ( LaptopSaveInfo.fSentImpWarningAlready == FALSE ) )
02646       {
02647             LaptopSaveInfo.fSentImpWarningAlready = TRUE;
02648             AddEmail(IMP_EMAIL_AGAIN,IMP_EMAIL_AGAIN_LENGTH,1, GetWorldTotalMin( ) );
02649       }
02650 }

02653 BOOLEAN 
02654 CreateLapTopMouseRegions()
02655 {
02656  // define regions
02657       
02658 
02659  // the entire laptop display region
02660  MSYS_DefineRegion( &gLapTopScreenRegion, ( UINT16 )( LaptopScreenRect.iLeft ),( UINT16 )( LaptopScreenRect.iTop ),( UINT16 ) ( LaptopScreenRect.iRight ),( UINT16 )( LaptopScreenRect.iBottom ), MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL+1,
02661                                           CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN, ScreenRegionMvtCallback, LapTopScreenCallBack ); 
02662 
02663  
02664  //MSYS_AddRegion(&gLapTopScreenRegion);
02665  return (TRUE);
02666 }

02677 void FinancialRegionButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
02678 {
02679 
02680       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
02681             return;
02682       
02683       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02684       {
02685        if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
02686         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);    
02687       }
02688       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02689   {
02690    if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
02691             {
02692 
02693               btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
02694                         if(giCurrentRegion!=FINANCIAL_REGION)
02695                          giOldRegion=giCurrentRegion;
02696                         giCurrentRegion=FINANCIAL_REGION;
02697                         if(gfShowBookmarks)
02698                         {
02699                          gfShowBookmarks=FALSE;
02700                          fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
02701                         }
02702                         guiCurrentLaptopMode=LAPTOP_MODE_FINANCES;
02703 
02704                         UpdateListToReflectNewProgramOpened( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_FINANCES );
02705 
02706         }
02707       }
02708 } 
02709

02712 void PersonnelRegionButtonCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
02713 {     
02714   
02715       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
02716             return;
02717       
02718       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02719       {
02720        if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
02721         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);    
02722       }
02723       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02724   {
02725    if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
02726             {
02727               btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
02728 
02729 
02730                   if(giCurrentRegion!=PERSONNEL_REGION)
02731                   giOldRegion=giCurrentRegion;
02732                   giCurrentRegion=PERSONNEL_REGION;
02733                   guiCurrentLaptopMode=LAPTOP_MODE_PERSONNEL;
02734                   if(gfShowBookmarks)
02735                   {
02736                    gfShowBookmarks=FALSE;
02737                    fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
02738                   }
02739                   RestoreOldRegion(giOldRegion);
02740                   HighLightRegion(giCurrentRegion);
02741                   gfShowBookmarks=FALSE;
02742 
02743                   UpdateListToReflectNewProgramOpened( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_PERSONNEL );
02744 
02745              }
02746        }
02747 
02748 }

02751 void EmailRegionButtonCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason )    
02752 {     
02753   
02754       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
02755             return;
02756       
02757       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02758       {
02759        if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
02760         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);    
02761       }
02762       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02763   {
02764    if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
02765             {
02766               btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
02767                   // set old region
02768                   if(giCurrentRegion!=EMAIL_REGION)
02769                    giOldRegion=giCurrentRegion;
02770   
02771                   // stop showing WWW bookmarks
02772                   if(gfShowBookmarks)
02773                   {
02774                    gfShowBookmarks=FALSE;
02775                   }
02776 
02777                   // set current highlight region
02778                   giCurrentRegion=EMAIL_REGION;
02779   
02780                   // restore old region
02781                   RestoreOldRegion(giOldRegion);
02782 
02783                   // set up current mode
02784                   guiCurrentLaptopMode =LAPTOP_MODE_EMAIL;
02785   
02786                   UpdateListToReflectNewProgramOpened( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MAILER );
02787 
02788                   // highlight current region
02789                   HighLightRegion(giCurrentRegion);
02790   
02791                   //redraw screen
02792                   fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
02793             }
02794        }
02795 }

02798 
02799 void WWWRegionButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason )
02800 {            
02801       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
02802             return;
02803       
02804       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02805       {
02806        if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
02807         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);    
02808       }
02809   else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN )
02810       {
02811        if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
02812         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);    
02813       }
02814       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02815   {
02816    if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
02817             {
02818               btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
02819                   if(giCurrentRegion!=WWW_REGION)
02820                         giOldRegion=giCurrentRegion;
02821                   if(!fNewWWW)
02822                         fNewWWWDisplay=FALSE;
02823 
02824                   // reset show bookmarks
02825                   if( guiCurrentLaptopMode < LAPTOP_MODE_WWW )
02826                   {
02827                     gfShowBookmarks = FALSE;
02828                         fShowBookmarkInfo = TRUE;
02829                   }
02830                   else
02831                   {
02832                         gfShowBookmarks = !gfShowBookmarks;
02833                   }
02834 
02835 
02836                   if((gfShowBookmarks)&&(!fNewWWW))
02837                   {
02838                    
02839                    fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
02840                    fNewWWWDisplay=FALSE;
02841                   }
02842                   else if( fNewWWW )
02843                   {
02844                         
02845                         // no longer a new WWW mode
02846                         fNewWWW=FALSE;
02847 
02848                         // new WWW to display
02849                         fNewWWWDisplay=TRUE;
02850 
02851                         // make sure program is maximized
02852                         if( gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_WEB_BROWSER ] == LAPTOP_PROGRAM_OPEN )
02853                         {
02854                           // re render laptop region
02855                           RenderLapTopImage();
02856 
02857                          // re render background
02858                          DrawDeskTopBackground( );
02859 
02860                         }
02861                   }
02862                   giCurrentRegion=WWW_REGION;
02863                   RestoreOldRegion(giOldRegion);
02864                   if(guiCurrentWWWMode!=LAPTOP_MODE_NONE)
02865                    guiCurrentLaptopMode = guiCurrentWWWMode;
02866                   else
02867                         guiCurrentLaptopMode=LAPTOP_MODE_WWW;
02868                   UpdateListToReflectNewProgramOpened( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_WEB_BROWSER );
02869                   HighLightRegion(giCurrentRegion);
02870                   fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
02871              }
02872       }
02873   else if (reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
02874   {
02875             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
02876             {
02877                   btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
02878                   // nothing yet
02879             
02880   
02881                   if(giCurrentRegion!=WWW_REGION)
02882                    giOldRegion=giCurrentRegion;
02883                   
02884                   giCurrentRegion=WWW_REGION;
02885   
02886                   RestoreOldRegion(giOldRegion);
02887   
02888                   if(guiCurrentWWWMode!=LAPTOP_MODE_NONE)
02889                    guiCurrentLaptopMode = guiCurrentWWWMode;
02890                   else
02891                         guiCurrentLaptopMode=LAPTOP_MODE_WWW;
02892                   
02893                   HighLightRegion(giCurrentRegion);
02894   
02895                   fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
02896             }
02897  }
02898  
02899 }
02900

02902 void HistoryRegionButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason )
02903 {                  
02904       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
02905             return;
02906       
02907       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02908       {
02909        if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
02910         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);    
02911       }
02912       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02913   {
02914    if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
02915             {
02916                 btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
02917                         // if not in history, update to the fact
02918                         if(giCurrentRegion!=HISTORY_REGION)
02919                          giOldRegion=giCurrentRegion;
02920                         if(gfShowBookmarks)
02921                         {
02922                               // stop showing WWW bookmarks
02923                          gfShowBookmarks=FALSE;
02924                         }
02925 
02926                         // current region is history
02927                         giCurrentRegion=HISTORY_REGION;
02928   
02929                         // restore old region area
02930                         RestoreOldRegion(giOldRegion);
02931 
02932                         // set mode to history
02933                         guiCurrentLaptopMode=LAPTOP_MODE_HISTORY;
02934 
02935                         // hightlight current icon
02936                         HighLightRegion(giCurrentRegion);
02937 
02938                         UpdateListToReflectNewProgramOpened( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_HISTORY );
02939 
02940                         gfShowBookmarks=FALSE;
02941   
02942                         //redraw screen
02943                         fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
02944 
02945         }
02946       }
02947  
02948 }
02949 void FilesRegionButtonCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason )    
02950 {                  
02951       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
02952             return;
02953       
02954       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02955       {
02956        if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
02957         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);    
02958       }
02959       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02960   {
02961    if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
02962             {
02963                 btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
02964                         // reset old region
02965                         if(giCurrentRegion!=FILES_REGION)
02966                          giOldRegion=giCurrentRegion;
02967                         
02968                         // stop showing WWW bookmarks
02969                         if(gfShowBookmarks)
02970                         {
02971                          gfShowBookmarks=FALSE;
02972                          fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
02973                         }
02974 
02975                         // set new region
02976                         giCurrentRegion=FILES_REGION;
02977 
02978                         // restore old highlight region
02979                         RestoreOldRegion(giOldRegion);
02980 
02981                         // highlight new region
02982                         HighLightRegion(giCurrentRegion);
02983   
02984                         guiCurrentLaptopMode=LAPTOP_MODE_FILES;
02985 
02986                         UpdateListToReflectNewProgramOpened( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_FILES );
02987   
02988                         //redraw screen
02989                         fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
02990         }
02991       }
02992  
02993 }

02995 
02996 void HandleLapTopScreenMouseUi()
02997 {
02998  if ( gEmailRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA )
02999  {
03000   giHighLightRegion=EMAIL_REGION;
03001  }
03002  else if ( gPersonnelRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA )
03003  {
03004   giHighLightRegion=PERSONNEL_REGION;
03005  }
03006  else if ( gFinancialRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA )
03007  {
03008   giHighLightRegion=FINANCIAL_REGION;
03009  }
03010  else if ( gWWWRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA )
03011  {
03012   giHighLightRegion=WWW_REGION;
03013  }
03014  else if ( gFilesRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA )
03015  {
03016   giHighLightRegion=FILES_REGION;
03017  }
03018  else if ( gHistoryRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA )
03019  {
03020   giHighLightRegion=HISTORY_REGION;
03021  }
03022  else
03023   giHighLightRegion=NO_REGION;
03024  DrawHighLightRegionBox();
03025 }

03059 void WWWRegionMvtCallback(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
03060 {
03061       static INT32 iBaseTime=0;
03062   static INT32 iFrame=0;
03063       INT32 iDifference=0;
03064   HVOBJECT hLapTopIconHandle;
03065       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
03066       {
03067             iBaseTime=0;
03068             iFrame=0;
03069     GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiWWWICON);
03070         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, (UINT16)iFrame,LAPTOP_ICONS_X, LAPTOP_ICONS_WWW_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
03071         DrawLapTopText();
03072             HighLightRegion(giCurrentRegion);
03073             InvalidateRegion(0,0,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
03074       }     
03075 }
03076 
03077 
03078 void EmailRegionMvtCallback(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
03079 {
03080       static INT32 iBaseTime=0;
03081   static INT32 iFrame=0;
03082       INT32 iDifference=0;
03083   HVOBJECT hLapTopIconHandle;
03084       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
03085       {
03086             iBaseTime=0;
03087             iFrame=0;
03088     DrawLapTopText();
03089         GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiMAILICON);
03090         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, (UINT16)iFrame,LAPTOP_ICONS_X, LAPTOP_ICONS_MAIL_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
03091             if(fUnReadMailFlag)
03092             { 
03093          GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiUNREAD);
03094          BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 0,LAPTOP_ICONS_X+CHECK_X, LAPTOP_ICONS_MAIL_Y+CHECK_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
03095             }
03096             DrawLapTopText();
03097             HighLightRegion(giCurrentRegion);
03098             InvalidateRegion(0,0,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
03099       }     
03100 }

03180 
03181 void
03182 CheckIfMouseLeaveScreen()
03183 {
03184       POINT  MousePos;
03185   GetCursorPos(&MousePos);
03186   if((MousePos.x >LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X )||(MousePos.x<LAPTOP_UL_X)||(MousePos.y<LAPTOP_UL_Y )||(MousePos.y >LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_Y))
03187   {
03188    guiCurrentLapTopCursor=LAPTOP_PANEL_CURSOR;
03189   }
03190 
03191 }
03192 void ScreenRegionMvtCallback(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
03193 {
03194       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
03195       {
03196             return;
03197       }
03198       /*if (iReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE)
03199       {
03200             guiCurrentLapTopCursor=LAPTOP_SCREEN_CURSOR;
03201       }
03202   if (iReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
03203       {
03204     CheckIfMouseLeaveScreen();
03205       }
03206       */
03207 }
