03215 
03216 void DrawButtonText()
03217 {
03218 
03219       if(fErrorFlag)
03220             DrawTextOnErrorButton();
03221       switch(guiCurrentLaptopMode)
03222       {
03223             case LAPTOP_MODE_EMAIL:
03224                   DisplayEmailHeaders( );
03225                   break;
03226       }
03227       return;
03228 }
03229 
03230 void InitBookMarkList()
03231 {
03232       // sets bookmark list to -1
03233       memset( LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList, -1, sizeof( LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList ) );
03234       return;
03235 }
03236 
03237 void SetBookMark(INT32 iBookId)
03238 {
03239       // find first empty spot, set to iBookId
03240   INT32 iCounter=0;
03241   if(iBookId!=-2)
03242       {
03243        while(LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList[iCounter]!=-1)
03244        {
03245              // move trhough list until empty
03246              if( LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList[iCounter]==iBookId)
03247              {
03248                    // found it, return
03249                    return;
03250              }
03251              iCounter++;
03252        }
03253        LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList[iCounter]=iBookId;
03254       }
03255       return;
03256 }
03257 
03258 
03259 BOOLEAN RemoveBookMark( INT32 iBookId )
03260 {
03261   INT32 iCounter=0;
03262 
03263       //Loop through the bookmarks to get to the desired bookmark
03264       while( LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList[iCounter] != iBookId )
03265       {
03266             iCounter++;
03267       }
03268 
03269       //Did we find the right one?
03270       if( LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList[iCounter] == iBookId )
03271       {
03272             //Reset it
03273             LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList[iCounter] = -1;
03274 
03275             //return true signifing that we found it
03276             return( TRUE );
03277       }
03278 
03279       //nope, we didnt find it.
03280       return( FALSE );
03281 }
03282 
03283 
03284 
03285 BOOLEAN LoadBookmark()
03286 {
03287   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
03288 
03289 
03290             // grab download bars too
03291 
03292   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
03293       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\downloadtop.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
03294       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiDOWNLOADTOP));
03295   
03296       
03297       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
03298       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\downloadmid.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
03299       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiDOWNLOADMID));
03300       
03301       
03302       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
03303       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\downloadbot.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
03304       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiDOWNLOADBOT));
03305 
03306 
03307   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
03308       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\bookmarktop.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
03309       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBOOKTOP));
03310 
03311 
03312   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
03313       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\bookmarkmiddle.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
03314       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBOOKMID));
03315   
03316       
03317       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
03318       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\webpages.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
03319       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBOOKMARK));
03320 
03321       
03322   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
03323       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\hilite.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
03324       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBOOKHIGH));
03325   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
03326       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\Bookmarkbottom.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
03327       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBOOKBOT));
03328 
03329 
03330       return( TRUE );
03331 }

03334 
03335 void DisplayBookMarks( void )
03336 {
03337       // will look at bookmarklist and set accordingly
03338       INT32 iCounter=1;
03339       // load images
03340   HVOBJECT hLapTopIconHandle;
03341    // laptop icons
03342       INT16 sX, sY;
03343       
03344 
03345       // check if we are maximizing or minimizing.. if so, do not display
03346       if( ( fMaximizingProgram == TRUE ) || ( fMinizingProgram == TRUE ) )
03347       {
03348             return;
03349       }
03350 
03351 
03352       // font stuff
03353       SetFont(BOOK_FONT);
03354       SetFontForeground(FONT_WHITE);
03355       SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
03356       SetFontShadow(NO_SHADOW);
03357 
03358       // set buffer
03359       SetFontDestBuffer(FRAME_BUFFER ,BOOK_X, BOOK_TOP_Y,BOOK_X+BOOK_WIDTH-10,SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE);
03360       
03361       
03362       // blt in book mark background
03363       while( LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList[iCounter-1]!=-1)
03364       {
03365       
03366    if(iHighLightBookLine==iCounter-1)
03367        {     
03368              GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiBOOKHIGH);
03369      BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 0,BOOK_X, BOOK_TOP_Y+ ( iCounter*( BOOK_HEIGHT + 6 ) )+ 6, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
03370        }
03371        else
03372        {
03373      GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiBOOKMARK);
03374      BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 0,BOOK_X, BOOK_TOP_Y+ ( iCounter*( BOOK_HEIGHT + 6 ) )+ 6, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
03375        }
03376 
03377        if( iHighLightBookLine==iCounter-1 )
03378        {
03379          // blit in text
03380      SetFontForeground(FONT_WHITE);
03381      SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
03382        }
03383        else
03384        {
03385      // blit in text
03386      SetFontForeground(FONT_BLACK);
03387      SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
03388        }
03389        
03390        FindFontCenterCoordinates(BOOK_X + 3, (UINT16)(BOOK_TOP_Y+2+(iCounter*( BOOK_HEIGHT + 6 ) ) + 6),BOOK_WIDTH - 3,BOOK_HEIGHT+6, pBookMarkStrings[ LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList[iCounter-1] ] , BOOK_FONT, &sX, &sY );
03391        
03392        mprintf(sX, sY,pBookMarkStrings[ LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList[iCounter-1] ] );
03393              iCounter++; 
03394       }
03395 
03396       // blit one more
03397 
03398 
03399        if(iHighLightBookLine==iCounter-1)
03400        {     
03401                   GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiBOOKHIGH);
03402                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 0,BOOK_X, BOOK_TOP_Y+ ( iCounter*( BOOK_HEIGHT + 6 ) )+ 6, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
03403        }
03404        else
03405        {
03406      GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiBOOKMARK);
03407      BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 0,BOOK_X, BOOK_TOP_Y+ ( iCounter*( BOOK_HEIGHT + 6 ) )+ 6, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
03408        }
03409 
03410        if( iHighLightBookLine==iCounter-1 )
03411        {
03412          // blit in text
03413      SetFontForeground(FONT_WHITE);
03414      SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
03415        }
03416        else
03417        {
03418      // blit in text
03419      SetFontForeground(FONT_BLACK);
03420      SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
03421        }
03422        FindFontCenterCoordinates(BOOK_X + 3, (UINT16)(BOOK_TOP_Y+2+(iCounter*( BOOK_HEIGHT + 6 ) ) + 6),BOOK_WIDTH - 3,BOOK_HEIGHT+6,pBookMarkStrings[ CANCEL_STRING ] , BOOK_FONT, &sX, &sY );
03423        mprintf(sX, sY,pBookMarkStrings[CANCEL_STRING] );
03424              iCounter++; 
03425 
03426        SetFontDestBuffer(FRAME_BUFFER,0,0,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE);
03427   
03428       //GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiBOOKBOT);
03429       //BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 0,BOOK_X, 6+BOOK_TOP_Y+(iCounter)*BOOK_HEIGHT, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
03430   
03431       /*if(fNewWWWDisplay)
03432    ScrollDisplayText(BOOK_TOP_Y+2+((iCounter)*BOOK_HEIGHT)+6);
03433       else
03434  */  InvalidateRegion(BOOK_X,BOOK_TOP_Y+((iCounter)*BOOK_HEIGHT)+12, BOOK_X+BOOK_WIDTH, BOOK_TOP_Y+((iCounter+1)*BOOK_HEIGHT)+16);
03435       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
03436 
03437       
03438       InvalidateRegion(BOOK_X, BOOK_TOP_Y, BOOK_X+BOOK_WIDTH, BOOK_TOP_Y+(iCounter + 6 )*BOOK_HEIGHT+16);
03439       return;
03440 }
03441 
03442 void RemoveBookmark(INT32 iBookId)
03443 {
03444   INT32 iCounter=0;
03445       if(iBookId==-2)
03446             return;
03447       while( LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList[iCounter]!=-1)
03448       {
03449             if( LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList[iCounter]==iBookId)
03450             {
03451      // found, move everyone back
03452                   for(iCounter=iCounter+1; iCounter <MAX_BOOKMARKS; iCounter++)
03453                   {
03454                         LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList[iCounter-1] = LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList[iCounter];
03455                   }
03456                   return;
03457             }
03458             iCounter++;
03459       }     
03460       return;
03461 }
03462 
03463 void DeleteBookmark()
03464 {
03465   DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiBOOKTOP);
03466       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiBOOKMID);
03467       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiBOOKHIGH);
03468       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiBOOKBOT);
03469   DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiBOOKMARK);
03470 
03471       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiDOWNLOADTOP);
03472       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiDOWNLOADMID);
03473       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiDOWNLOADBOT);
03474 
03475 
03476 }
03477 
03478 void ScrollDisplayText(INT32 iY)
03479 {
03480       static INT32 iBaseTime=0;
03481       static INT16 sCurX;
03482       INT16 sY=(INT16)iY;
03483 
03484       // if we are just enetering, set basetime to current clock value
03485       if(iBaseTime==0)
03486             iBaseTime=GetJA2Clock();
03487 
03488       // long enough time has passed, shift string
03489       if(GetJA2Clock()-iBaseTime >SCROLL_DIFFERENCE)
03490       {
03491    
03492    // reset postion, if scrolled too far
03493        if(sCurX <SCROLL_MIN)
03494              sCurX=BOOK_X+BOOK_WIDTH;
03495        else
03496              sCurX--;
03497 
03498        // reset base time
03499        iBaseTime=GetJA2Clock();
03500       }
03501 
03502        // font stuff
03503        SetFontDestBuffer(FRAME_BUFFER, BOOK_X,0,BOOK_X+BOOK_WIDTH,SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE);
03504 
03505        SetFontForeground(FONT_BLACK);
03506        SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
03507        
03508        // print the scrolling string for bookmarks
03509        mprintf(sCurX, iY, pBookmarkTitle[1]);
03510 
03511        // reset buffer
03512        SetFontDestBuffer(FRAME_BUFFER, 0,0,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE);     
03513        
03514        // invalidate region
03515        InvalidateRegion(BOOK_X,iY, BOOK_X+BOOK_WIDTH, iY+BOOK_HEIGHT);
03516 
03517 }
03518 void CreateBookMarkMouseRegions()
03519 {
03520       INT32 iCounter=0;
03521       // creates regions based on number of entries
03522   while( LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList[iCounter] != -1 )
03523       {
03524         MSYS_DefineRegion(&gBookmarkMouseRegions[iCounter],(INT16)BOOK_X, (UINT16)(BOOK_TOP_Y+((iCounter+1)*(BOOK_HEIGHT+6))+6), BOOK_X+BOOK_WIDTH ,(INT16)(BOOK_TOP_Y+((iCounter+2)*(BOOK_HEIGHT+6))+6),
03525                   MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 2,CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN, BookmarkMvtCallBack, BookmarkCallBack );
03526         //MSYS_AddRegion(&gBookmarkMouseRegions[iCounter]);
03527             MSYS_SetRegionUserData(&gBookmarkMouseRegions[iCounter],0,iCounter);
03528             MSYS_SetRegionUserData(&gBookmarkMouseRegions[iCounter],1,0);
03529 
03530             //Create the regions help text
03531             CreateBookMarkHelpText( &gBookmarkMouseRegions[iCounter], LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList[iCounter] );
03532 
03533         iCounter++;
03534       }
03535       // now add one more
03536       // for the cancel button
03537    MSYS_DefineRegion(&gBookmarkMouseRegions[iCounter],(INT16)BOOK_X, (UINT16)(BOOK_TOP_Y+((iCounter+1)*(BOOK_HEIGHT+6))+6), BOOK_X+BOOK_WIDTH ,(INT16)(BOOK_TOP_Y+((iCounter+2)*(BOOK_HEIGHT+6))+6),
03538                   MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 2,CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN, BookmarkMvtCallBack, BookmarkCallBack );
03539         //MSYS_AddRegion(&gBookmarkMouseRegions[iCounter]);
03540        MSYS_SetRegionUserData(&gBookmarkMouseRegions[iCounter],0,iCounter);
03541    MSYS_SetRegionUserData(&gBookmarkMouseRegions[iCounter],1,CANCEL_STRING );
03542 }
03543 
03544 void DeleteBookmarkRegions()
03545 {
03546       INT32 iCounter=0;
03547       //deletes bookmark regions
03548   while( LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList[iCounter] != -1 )
03549       {
03550     MSYS_RemoveRegion(&gBookmarkMouseRegions[iCounter]);
03551         iCounter++;
03552       }
03553 
03554 
03555       // now one for the cancel
03556       MSYS_RemoveRegion(&gBookmarkMouseRegions[iCounter]);
03557 
03558 
03559 }
03560 
03561 void CreateDestoryBookMarkRegions( void )
03562 {
03563       // checks to see if a bookmark needs to be created or destroyed
03564       static BOOLEAN fOldShowBookmarks=FALSE;
03565 
03566       if((gfShowBookmarks)&&(!fOldShowBookmarks))
03567       {
03568             // create regions
03569     CreateBookMarkMouseRegions( );
03570         fOldShowBookmarks=TRUE;
03571       }
03572       else if((!gfShowBookmarks)&&(fOldShowBookmarks))
03573       {
03574     // destroy bookmarks
03575             DeleteBookmarkRegions( );
03576     fOldShowBookmarks=FALSE;
03577       }
03578 
03579 
03580 }
03581 
03582 
03583 
03584 void BookmarkCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
03585 { 
03586  INT32 iCount;
03587  
03588  if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
03589  {
03590       return;
03591  }
03592  
03593  // we are in process of loading
03594  if( fLoadPendingFlag == TRUE )
03595  {
03596        return;
03597  }
03598 
03599  if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
03600  {
03601        iCount=MSYS_GetRegionUserData(pRegion, 0);
03602        if( MSYS_GetRegionUserData(pRegion, 1) == CANCEL_STRING )
03603        {
03604              gfShowBookmarks = FALSE;
03605              fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
03606        }
03607    if( LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList[iCount] != -1 )
03608        {     
03609              GoToWebPage( LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList[iCount] );
03610        }
03611        else
03612        {
03613              return;
03614        }
03615  }
03616  else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
03617  {
03618    iCount=MSYS_GetRegionUserData(pRegion, 0);
03619        
03620  }
03621  return;
03622 }
03623  
03624 
03625 
03626 void GoToWebPage(INT32 iPageId )
03627 { 
03628 
03629       // WANNE 2: disabled rain sound when laptop is displayed
03630       ////if it is raining, popup a warning first saying connection time may be slow
03631       //if( IsItRaining() )
03632       //{
03633       //    if( giRainDelayInternetSite == -1 )
03634       //    {
03635       //          DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_LAPTOP_DEFAULT, pErrorStrings[4], LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, InternetRainDelayMessageBoxCallBack );
03636       //          giRainDelayInternetSite = iPageId;
03637       //          return;
03638       //    }
03639       //}
03640       //else
03641       //    giRainDelayInternetSite = -1;
03642 
03643       switch(iPageId)
03644       {
03645             case AIM_BOOKMARK:
03646                   guiCurrentWWWMode=LAPTOP_MODE_AIM;
03647               guiCurrentLaptopMode=LAPTOP_MODE_AIM;
03648                   
03649                   // do we have to have a World Wide Wait
03650                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.fVisitedBookmarkAlready[ AIM_BOOKMARK ] == FALSE )
03651                   {
03652         // reset flag and set load pending flag
03653                         LaptopSaveInfo.fVisitedBookmarkAlready[ AIM_BOOKMARK ] = TRUE;
03654         fLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
03655                   }
03656                   else
03657                   {
03658                         // fast reload
03659         fLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
03660                         fFastLoadFlag =  TRUE;
03661                   }
03662             break;
03663             case BOBBYR_BOOKMARK:
03664                   guiCurrentWWWMode=LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R;
03665               guiCurrentLaptopMode=LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R;
03666                   
03667                         // do we have to have a World Wide Wait
03668                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.fVisitedBookmarkAlready[ BOBBYR_BOOKMARK ] == FALSE )
03669                   {
03670         // reset flag and set load pending flag
03671                         LaptopSaveInfo.fVisitedBookmarkAlready[ BOBBYR_BOOKMARK ] = TRUE;
03672         fLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
03673                   }
03674                   else
03675                   {
03676                         // fast reload
03677         fLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
03678                         fFastLoadFlag =  TRUE;
03679                   }
03680             break;
03681             case( IMP_BOOKMARK ):
03682               guiCurrentWWWMode=LAPTOP_MODE_CHAR_PROFILE;
03683               guiCurrentLaptopMode=LAPTOP_MODE_CHAR_PROFILE;
03684                   
03685                   // do we have to have a World Wide Wait
03686                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.fVisitedBookmarkAlready[ IMP_BOOKMARK ] == FALSE )
03687                   {
03688         // reset flag and set load pending flag
03689                         LaptopSaveInfo.fVisitedBookmarkAlready[ IMP_BOOKMARK ] = TRUE;
03690         fLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
03691                   }
03692                   else
03693                   {
03694                         // fast reload
03695         fLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
03696                         fFastLoadFlag =  TRUE;
03697                   }
03698                   iCurrentImpPage = IMP_HOME_PAGE;
03699             break;
03700             case( MERC_BOOKMARK ):
03701 
03702                   //if the mercs server has gone down, but hasnt come up yet
03703                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.fMercSiteHasGoneDownYet == TRUE && LaptopSaveInfo.fFirstVisitSinceServerWentDown == FALSE )
03704                   {
03705                         guiCurrentWWWMode = LAPTOP_MODE_BROKEN_LINK;
03706                         guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_BROKEN_LINK;
03707                   }
03708                   else
03709                   {
03710                         guiCurrentWWWMode = LAPTOP_MODE_MERC;
03711                         guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_MERC;
03712                   }
03713 
03714                   
03715                   // do we have to have a World Wide Wait
03716                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.fVisitedBookmarkAlready[ MERC_BOOKMARK ] == FALSE )
03717                   {
03718         // reset flag and set load pending flag
03719                         LaptopSaveInfo.fVisitedBookmarkAlready[ MERC_BOOKMARK ] = TRUE;
03720         fLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
03721                   }
03722                   else
03723                   {
03724                         // fast reload
03725         fLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
03726                         fFastLoadFlag =  TRUE;
03727                   }
03728             break;
03729             case( FUNERAL_BOOKMARK ):
03730               guiCurrentWWWMode=LAPTOP_MODE_FUNERAL;
03731               guiCurrentLaptopMode=LAPTOP_MODE_FUNERAL;
03732                   
03733                   // do we have to have a World Wide Wait
03734                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.fVisitedBookmarkAlready[ FUNERAL_BOOKMARK ] == FALSE )
03735                   {
03736         // reset flag and set load pending flag
03737                         LaptopSaveInfo.fVisitedBookmarkAlready[ FUNERAL_BOOKMARK ] = TRUE;
03738         fLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
03739                   }
03740                   else
03741                   {
03742                         // fast reload
03743         fLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
03744                         fFastLoadFlag =  TRUE;
03745                   }
03746             break;
03747             case( FLORIST_BOOKMARK ):
03748               guiCurrentWWWMode=LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST;
03749               guiCurrentLaptopMode=LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST;
03750                   
03751                   // do we have to have a World Wide Wait
03752                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.fVisitedBookmarkAlready[ FLORIST_BOOKMARK ] == FALSE )
03753                   {
03754         // reset flag and set load pending flag
03755                         LaptopSaveInfo.fVisitedBookmarkAlready[ FLORIST_BOOKMARK ] = TRUE;
03756         fLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
03757                   }
03758                   else
03759                   {
03760                         // fast reload
03761         fLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
03762                         fFastLoadFlag =  TRUE;
03763                   }
03764             break;
03765 
03766             case( INSURANCE_BOOKMARK ):
03767               guiCurrentWWWMode=LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE;
03768               guiCurrentLaptopMode=LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE;
03769                   
03770                   // do we have to have a World Wide Wait
03771                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.fVisitedBookmarkAlready[ INSURANCE_BOOKMARK ] == FALSE )
03772                   {
03773         // reset flag and set load pending flag
03774                         LaptopSaveInfo.fVisitedBookmarkAlready[ INSURANCE_BOOKMARK ] = TRUE;
03775         fLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
03776                   }
03777                   else
03778                   {
03779                         // fast reload
03780         fLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
03781                         fFastLoadFlag =  TRUE;
03782                   }
03783             break;
03784       
03785       }
03786 
03787   gfShowBookmarks=FALSE;
03788       fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
03789       return;
03790 }
03791 
03792 void BookmarkMvtCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
03793 {
03794       if (iReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE)
03795       {
03796        iHighLightBookLine=MSYS_GetRegionUserData(pRegion, 0);
03797       }
03798   if (iReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
03799       {
03800     iHighLightBookLine=-1;
03801       }
03802 }
03803 
03804 
03805 BOOLEAN LoadLoadPending( void )
03806 {
03807       // function will load the load pending graphics
03808       // reuse bookmark
03809       // load graph window and bar
03810   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
03811       
03812       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
03813       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\graphwindow.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
03814       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiGRAPHWINDOW));
03815   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
03816       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\graphsegment.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
03817       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiGRAPHBAR));
03818 
03819 
03820       return (TRUE);
03821 }
03822 
03823 BOOLEAN DisplayLoadPending( void )
03824 {
03825       // this function will display the load pending and return if the load is done
03826   static INT32 iBaseTime=0;
03827       static INT32 iTotalTime=0;
03828       INT32 iTempTime=0;
03829       INT32 iCounter=0;
03830       INT32 iDifference=0;
03831       HVOBJECT hLapTopIconHandle;
03832   INT32 iLoadTime;
03833       INT32 iUnitTime;
03834   UINT32 uiTempLaptopMode = 0;
03835   UINT32 uiTempWWWMode = 0;
03836       INT16 sXPosition = 0, sYPosition = 0;
03837 
03838       // if merc webpage, make it longer
03839             //TEMP disables the loadpending
03840       if( gfTemporaryDisablingOfLoadPendingFlag )
03841       {
03842             iLoadTime=1;
03843             iUnitTime=1;
03844       }
03845       else
03846       {
03847             if( ( fFastLoadFlag == TRUE )&&( fConnectingToSubPage == TRUE ) )
03848             {
03849                   iUnitTime=FASTEST_UNIT_TIME;
03850             }
03851             else if( fFastLoadFlag == TRUE )
03852             {
03853                   iUnitTime=FAST_UNIT_TIME;
03854             }
03855             else if( fConnectingToSubPage == TRUE )
03856             {
03857                   iUnitTime=ALMOST_FAST_UNIT_TIME;
03858             }
03859 
03860             //if we are connecting the MERC site, and the MERC site hasnt yet moved to their new site, have the sloooww wait
03861             else if(guiCurrentLaptopMode == LAPTOP_MODE_MERC && !LaptopSaveInfo.fMercSiteHasGoneDownYet )
03862             {
03863                   iUnitTime=LONG_UNIT_TIME;
03864             }
03865             else
03866             {
03867                   iUnitTime=UNIT_TIME;
03868             }
03869 
03870             iUnitTime += WWaitDelayIncreasedIfRaining( iUnitTime );
03871 
03872             iLoadTime = iUnitTime * 30;
03873       }
03874 
03875       
03876       // we are now waiting on a web page to download, reset counter
03877       if(!fLoadPendingFlag)
03878       {
03879        fDoneLoadPending = FALSE;
03880        fFastLoadFlag = FALSE;
03881        fConnectingToSubPage = FALSE;
03882    iBaseTime=0;
03883    iTotalTime=0;
03884        return (FALSE);
03885       }
03886       // if total time is exceeded, return (TRUE)
03887       if(iBaseTime==0)
03888       {
03889        iBaseTime=GetJA2Clock();
03890       }
03891 
03892 
03893   
03894       if(iTotalTime >= iLoadTime)
03895       {
03896             // done loading, redraw screen
03897             fLoadPendingFlag  = FALSE;
03898             fFastLoadFlag = FALSE;
03899             iTotalTime=0;
03900             iBaseTime=0;
03901             fDoneLoadPending = TRUE;
03902             fConnectingToSubPage = FALSE;
03903             fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
03904 
03905             return(TRUE);
03906       }
03907 
03908 
03909       iDifference=GetJA2Clock()-iBaseTime;
03910       
03911       
03912 
03913       // difference has been long enough or we are redrawing the screen
03914       if( (iDifference) > iUnitTime) 
03915       {  
03916             // LONG ENOUGH TIME PASSED
03917             iCounter=0;
03918             iBaseTime=GetJA2Clock();
03919             iTotalTime+=iDifference;
03920     iTempTime=iTotalTime;
03921     
03922       }
03923       
03924       // new mail, don't redraw
03925       if( fNewMailFlag == TRUE )
03926       {
03927             return( FALSE );
03928       }
03929 
03930       RenderButtons( );
03931 
03932 //    RenderFastHelp( );
03933 //    RenderButtonsFastHelp( );
03934 
03935 
03936       // display top middle and bottom of box
03937   GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiDOWNLOADTOP);
03938       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 0,DOWNLOAD_X, DOWNLOAD_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
03939   GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiDOWNLOADMID);
03940   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 0,DOWNLOAD_X, DOWNLOAD_Y+DOWN_HEIGHT, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
03941   GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiDOWNLOADBOT);
03942   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 0,DOWNLOAD_X, DOWNLOAD_Y+2*DOWN_HEIGHT, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
03943   GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiTITLEBARICONS);
03944       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 1,DOWNLOAD_X + 4, DOWNLOAD_Y + 1, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
03945 
03946             
03947   // font stuff
03948       SetFont(DOWNLOAD_FONT);
03949       SetFontForeground(FONT_WHITE);
03950       SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
03951   SetFontShadow(NO_SHADOW);
03952 
03953       // reload or download?
03954       if( fFastLoadFlag == TRUE )
03955   {
03956             FindFontCenterCoordinates( iScreenWidthOffset + 328,
03957                   iScreenHeightOffset, 118, 0, pDownloadString[1], DOWNLOAD_FONT, &sXPosition, &sYPosition );
03958 
03959     // display download string
03960             mprintf( sXPosition, DOWN_STRING_Y,pDownloadString[1]);
03961       }
03962       else 
03963       {
03964             FindFontCenterCoordinates( iScreenWidthOffset + 328,
03965                   iScreenHeightOffset, /*iScreenWidthOffset + */118, 0, pDownloadString[ 0 ], DOWNLOAD_FONT, &sXPosition, &sYPosition );
03966 
03967             // display download string
03968             mprintf( sXPosition, DOWN_STRING_Y,pDownloadString[0]);
03969       }     
03970 
03971       // get and blt the window video object
03972       GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiGRAPHWINDOW);
03973       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 0,LAPTOP_WINDOW_X, LAPTOP_WINDOW_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
03974             
03975       // check to see if we are only updating screen, but not passed a new element in the load pending display
03976             
03977         
03978   iTempTime = iTotalTime; 
03979       // decide how many time units are to be displayed, based on amount of time passed
03980       while(iTempTime >0)
03981       {
03982     GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiGRAPHBAR);
03983         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 0,LAPTOP_BAR_X+(UNIT_WIDTH*iCounter), LAPTOP_BAR_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
03984             iTempTime-=iUnitTime; 
03985             iCounter++; 
03986         
03987             // have we gone too far?
03988             if( iCounter > 30 )
03989             {
03990                   iTempTime = 0;
03991             }
03992       }
03993     
03994       InvalidateRegion(DOWNLOAD_X, DOWNLOAD_Y, DOWNLOAD_X + 150, DOWNLOAD_Y + 100);
03995 
03996       // re draw screen and new mail warning box
03997   SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
03998 
03999   MarkButtonsDirty( );
04000 
04001       DisableMercSiteButton();
04002 
04003       return (FALSE);  
04004 }
04005 
04006 void DeleteLoadPending( void )
04007 {
04008       // this funtion will delete the load pending graphics
04009       // reuse bookmark
04010   DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiGRAPHBAR);
04011   DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiGRAPHWINDOW);
04012       return;
04013 }
04014 
04015 void BtnErrorCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
04016 {
04017       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
04018             return;
04019 
04020       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
04021       {
04022             if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
04023             { 
04024             }
04025     btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
04026       }
04027       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
04028       {
04029             if(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
04030             {
04031              btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
04032              fErrorFlag=FALSE;
04033              
04034             }
04035       }
04036 }
04037 void CreateDestroyErrorButton( void )
04038 {
04039  static BOOLEAN fOldErrorFlag=FALSE; 
04040  if((fErrorFlag)&&(!fOldErrorFlag))
04041  {
04042        // create inventory button
04043   fOldErrorFlag=TRUE;
04044       
04045       // load image and create error confirm button
04046       giErrorButtonImage[0]=LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\errorbutton.sti" ,-1,0,-1,1,-1 );
04047   giErrorButton[0]= QuickCreateButton( giErrorButtonImage[0], ERROR_X+ERROR_BTN_X, ERROR_BTN_Y,
04048                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
04049                                                             (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnErrorCallback);
04050       
04051       // define the cursor
04052       SetButtonCursor(giErrorButton[0], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
04053   
04054       // define the screen mask
04055       MSYS_DefineRegion(&pScreenMask,0, 0,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT,
04056             MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST-3,CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, LapTopScreenCallBack);
04057       
04058       // add region 
04059       MSYS_AddRegion(&pScreenMask); 
04060  }
04061  else if((!fErrorFlag)&&(fOldErrorFlag))
04062  {
04063        // done dsiplaying, get rid of button and screen mask
04064    fOldErrorFlag=FALSE;
04065    
04066        RemoveButton( giErrorButton[0] );
04067    UnloadButtonImage( giErrorButtonImage[0] );
04068    
04069        MSYS_RemoveRegion(&pScreenMask);
04070 
04071        // re draw screen
04072        fReDrawScreenFlag=TRUE;
04073        
04074  }
04075       return;
04076 }

04079 void DisplayErrorBox( void )
04080 {
04081       // this function will display the error graphic
04082   HVOBJECT hLapTopIconHandle;
04083   if(!fErrorFlag)
04084             return;
04085 
04086       // get and blt top portion
04087       GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiBOOKTOP);
04088       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 0,ERROR_X, ERROR_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
04089   
04090       // middle * 5
04091       GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiBOOKMID);
04092   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 0,ERROR_X, ERROR_Y+BOOK_HEIGHT, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
04093   
04094       GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiBOOKMID);
04095   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 0,ERROR_X, ERROR_Y+2*BOOK_HEIGHT, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
04096   
04097       GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiBOOKMID);
04098   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 0,ERROR_X, ERROR_Y+3*BOOK_HEIGHT, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
04099       
04100       GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiBOOKMID);
04101   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 0,ERROR_X, ERROR_Y+4*BOOK_HEIGHT, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
04102   
04103       GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiBOOKMID);
04104   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 0,ERROR_X, ERROR_Y+5*BOOK_HEIGHT, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
04105       
04106       // the bottom
04107       GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiBOOKBOT);
04108       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 0,ERROR_X, ERROR_Y+6*BOOK_HEIGHT, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
04109   
04110       // font stuff
04111       SetFont(ERROR_TITLE_FONT);
04112   SetFontForeground(FONT_WHITE);
04113       SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
04114   SetFontShadow(NO_SHADOW);
04115       
04116       // print title
04117       mprintf(ERROR_TITLE_X, ERROR_TITLE_Y, pErrorStrings[0]);
04118   SetFontForeground(FONT_BLACK);
04119   SetFont(ERROR_FONT);
04120   
04121       // display error string
04122       DisplayWrappedString(ERROR_X+ERROR_TEXT_X,(UINT16)(ERROR_Y+ERROR_TEXT_Y+DisplayWrappedString(ERROR_X+ERROR_TEXT_X, ERROR_Y+ERROR_TEXT_Y, BOOK_WIDTH, 2,ERROR_FONT,FONT_BLACK, pErrorStrings[1],FONT_BLACK,FALSE,CENTER_JUSTIFIED)), BOOK_WIDTH, 2,ERROR_FONT,FONT_BLACK, pErrorStrings[2],FONT_BLACK,FALSE,CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
04123 
04124       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
04125   
04126       return;
04127 }

04216 void DisplayPlayersBalanceToDate( void )
04217 {
04218   // print players balance to date
04219   CHAR16 sString[ 100 ];
04220   INT16 sX, sY;
04221 
04222       // initialize string
04223       memset( sString, 0, sizeof( sString ) );
04224 
04225       // font stuff
04226       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL);
04227       SetFontForeground( 142 );
04228   SetFontShadow(NO_SHADOW);
04229 
04230       // parse straigth number
04231       swprintf( sString, L"%d", LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance );
04232 
04233       // put in commas, then dollar sign
04234       InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sString );
04235       InsertDollarSignInToString( sString );
04236   
04237       // get center
04238       FindFontCenterCoordinates( (INT16)LAPTOP_ICON_TEXT_X, iScreenHeightOffset, (INT16)(LAPTOP_ICON_TEXT_WIDTH) ,(INT16)(LAPTOP_ICON_TEXT_HEIGHT), sString, LAPTOPICONFONT, &sX, &sY );
04239 
04240 //    gprintfdirty( sX , LAPTOP_ICON_TEXT_FINANCIAL_Y + 10, sString );
04241       // printf it!
04242       if( ButtonList[ gLaptopButton[ 5 ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON )
04243       {
04244             mprintf( sX + 5, LAPTOP_ICON_TEXT_FINANCIAL_Y + 10 + 5, sString);
04245       }
04246       else
04247       {
04248             mprintf( sX, LAPTOP_ICON_TEXT_FINANCIAL_Y + 10, sString);
04249       }
04250 
04251       // reset shadow
04252   SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
04253 
04254       return;
04255 }

04274 
04275 void HandleLapTopESCKey( void )
04276 {
04277 
04278       // will handle esc key events, since handling depends on state of laptop
04279       
04280 
04281       if( fNewMailFlag )
04282       {
04283             // get rid of new mail warning box
04284         fNewMailFlag=FALSE;
04285     CreateDestroyNewMailButton();
04286         
04287             // force redraw
04288         fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04289         RenderLaptop( );
04290       }
04291       else if(fDeleteMailFlag)
04292       {
04293     // get rid of delete mail box
04294         fDeleteMailFlag=FALSE;
04295         CreateDestroyDeleteNoticeMailButton();
04296 
04297             // force redraw
04298         fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04299         RenderLaptop( );
04300       }
04301       else if( fErrorFlag )
04302       {
04303             // get rid of error warning box
04304     fErrorFlag=FALSE;
04305         CreateDestroyErrorButton();
04306 
04307             // force redraw
04308         fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04309         RenderLaptop( );
04310       }     
04311 
04312       else if( gfShowBookmarks )
04313       {
04314             // get rid of bookmarks
04315             gfShowBookmarks = FALSE;
04316 
04317             // force redraw
04318         fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04319             RenderLapTopImage( );
04320         RenderLaptop( );
04321       }
04322       else
04323       {
04324     // leave
04325             fExitingLaptopFlag = TRUE;
04326             HandleExit( );
04327       }
04328 
04329       
04330 
04331       return;
04332 }
04333 
04334 
04335 void HandleRightButtonUpEvent( void )
04336 {
04337 
04338       // will handle the right button up event
04339       if( fNewMailFlag )
04340       {
04341             // get rid of new mail warning box
04342         fNewMailFlag=FALSE;
04343     CreateDestroyNewMailButton();
04344         
04345             // force redraw
04346         fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04347         RenderLaptop( );
04348       }
04349       else if(fDeleteMailFlag)
04350       {
04351     // get rid of delete mail box
04352         fDeleteMailFlag=FALSE;
04353         CreateDestroyDeleteNoticeMailButton();
04354 
04355             // force redraw
04356         fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04357         RenderLaptop( );
04358       }
04359       else if( fErrorFlag )
04360       {
04361             // get rid of error warning box
04362     fErrorFlag=FALSE;
04363         CreateDestroyErrorButton();
04364 
04365             // force redraw
04366         fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04367         RenderLaptop( );
04368       }     
04369 
04370       else if( gfShowBookmarks )
04371       {
04372             // get rid of bookmarks
04373             gfShowBookmarks = FALSE;
04374 
04375             // force redraw
04376         fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04377             RenderLapTopImage( );
04378         RenderLaptop( );
04379       }
04380       else if( fDisplayMessageFlag )
04381       {
04382             fDisplayMessageFlag = FALSE;
04383 
04384                   // force redraw
04385         fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04386             RenderLapTopImage( );
04387         RenderLaptop( );
04388 
04389       }
04390       else if( fShowBookmarkInfo )
04391       {
04392             fShowBookmarkInfo = FALSE;
04393       }
04394 
04395 }
04396 
04397 
04398 void HandleLeftButtonUpEvent( void )
04399 {
04400 
04401       // will handle the left button up event
04402 
04403       if( gfShowBookmarks )
04404       {
04405             // get rid of bookmarks
04406             gfShowBookmarks = FALSE;
04407 
04408             // force redraw
04409         fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04410             RenderLapTopImage( );
04411         RenderLaptop( );
04412       }
04413       else if( fShowBookmarkInfo )
04414       {
04415             fShowBookmarkInfo = FALSE;
04416       }
04417 }
04418 
04419 void LapTopScreenCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
04420 { 
04421  
04422   if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
04423   {
04424 
04425         return;
04426   }
04427  
04428       if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
04429       {
04430             HandleLeftButtonUpEvent( );
04431             return;
04432       }
04433   if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
04434   {
04435     HandleRightButtonUpEvent( );
04436             return;
04437   }
04438 
04439       return;
04440 }
04441 
04442 template BOOLEAN DoLapTopMessageBox<unsigned short *>(UINT8, unsigned short *, UINT32, UINT8, MSGBOX_CALLBACK);
04443 template BOOLEAN DoLapTopMessageBox<unsigned short const *>(UINT8, unsigned short const *, UINT32, UINT8, MSGBOX_CALLBACK);
04444 template <typename string2>
04445 BOOLEAN           DoLapTopMessageBox( UINT8 ubStyle, string2 zString, UINT32 uiExitScreen, UINT8 ubFlags, MSGBOX_CALLBACK ReturnCallback )
04446 {
04447   SGPRect pCenteringRect= {LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X, LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_Y, LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X, LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_Y };
04448 
04449   
04450       // reset exit mode
04451       fExitDueToMessageBox = TRUE;
04452  
04453 
04454 
04455       // do message box and return
04456   iLaptopMessageBox = DoMessageBox(  ubStyle,  zString,  uiExitScreen, ( UINT8 ) ( ubFlags| MSG_BOX_FLAG_USE_CENTERING_RECT ),  ReturnCallback,  &pCenteringRect );
04457 
04458       
04459 
04460       // send back return state
04461       return( ( iLaptopMessageBox != -1 ) );
04462 }
04463 
04464 
04465 BOOLEAN DoLapTopSystemMessageBoxWithRect( UINT8 ubStyle, INT16 *zString, UINT32 uiExitScreen, UINT16 usFlags, MSGBOX_CALLBACK ReturnCallback, SGPRect *pCenteringRect )
04466 {
04467       // reset exit mode
04468       fExitDueToMessageBox = TRUE;
04469 
04470       // do message box and return
04471   iLaptopMessageBox = DoMessageBox(  ubStyle,  zString,  uiExitScreen, ( UINT16 ) ( usFlags| MSG_BOX_FLAG_USE_CENTERING_RECT ),  ReturnCallback,  pCenteringRect );
04472 
04473       // send back return state
04474       return( ( iLaptopMessageBox != -1 ) );
04475 }
04476 
04477 BOOLEAN DoLapTopSystemMessageBox( UINT8 ubStyle, INT16 *zString, UINT32 uiExitScreen, UINT16 usFlags, MSGBOX_CALLBACK ReturnCallback )
04478 {
04479       SGPRect CenteringRect= {iScreenWidthOffset, iScreenHeightOffset,
04480             iScreenWidthOffset + 640, INV_INTERFACE_START_Y };
04481 
04482 
04483       // reset exit mode
04484       fExitDueToMessageBox = TRUE;
04485 
04486       // do message box and return
04487   iLaptopMessageBox = DoMessageBox(  ubStyle,  zString,  uiExitScreen, ( UINT16 ) ( usFlags| MSG_BOX_FLAG_USE_CENTERING_RECT ),  ReturnCallback, &CenteringRect );
04488 
04489       // send back return state
04490       return( ( iLaptopMessageBox != -1 ) );
04491 }

04494 
04495 //places a tileable pattern down
04496 BOOLEAN WebPageTileBackground(UINT8 ubNumX, UINT8 ubNumY, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight, UINT32 uiBackgroundIdentifier)
04497 {
04498   HVOBJECT hBackGroundHandle;
04499       UINT16      x,y, uiPosX, uiPosY;
04500 
04501       // Blt the Wood background
04502       GetVideoObject(&hBackGroundHandle, uiBackgroundIdentifier);
04503 
04504       uiPosY = LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y;
04505       for(y=0; y<ubNumY; y++)
04506       {
04507             uiPosX = LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X;
04508             for(x=0; x<ubNumX; x++)
04509             {
04510               BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hBackGroundHandle, 0,uiPosX, uiPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
04511                   uiPosX += usWidth;
04512             }
04513             uiPosY += usHeight;
04514       }
04515       return(TRUE);
04516 }
04517 
04518 
04519 BOOLEAN InitTitleBarMaximizeGraphics( UINT32 uiBackgroundGraphic, STR16 pTitle, UINT32 uiIconGraphic, UINT16 usIconGraphicIndex )
04520 {
04521       VSURFACE_DESC           vs_desc;
04522   HVOBJECT  hImageHandle;
04523 
04524       Assert( uiBackgroundGraphic );
04525 
04526       // Create a background video surface to blt the title bar onto
04527       vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_DEFAULT | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
04528       vs_desc.usWidth = LAPTOP_TITLE_BAR_WIDTH;
04529       vs_desc.usHeight = LAPTOP_TITLE_BAR_HEIGHT;
04530       vs_desc.ubBitDepth = 16;
04531       CHECKF( AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, &guiTitleBarSurface) );
04532 
04533       //blit the toolbar grapgucs onto the surface
04534       GetVideoObject(&hImageHandle, uiBackgroundGraphic);
04535       BltVideoObject(guiTitleBarSurface, hImageHandle, 0,0,0, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
04536 
04537       //blit th icon onto the tool bar
04538       GetVideoObject(&hImageHandle, uiIconGraphic);
04539       BltVideoObject(guiTitleBarSurface, hImageHandle, usIconGraphicIndex, LAPTOP_TITLE_BAR_ICON_OFFSET_X, LAPTOP_TITLE_BAR_ICON_OFFSET_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
04540 
04541       SetFontDestBuffer( guiTitleBarSurface, 0, 0, vs_desc.usWidth, vs_desc.usHeight , FALSE);
04542       DrawTextToScreen(pTitle, LAPTOP_TITLE_BAR_TEXT_OFFSET_X, LAPTOP_TITLE_BAR_TEXT_OFFSET_Y, 0, FONT14ARIAL, FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED    );
04543       SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE);
04544 
04545       return( TRUE );
04546 }
04547 
04548 BOOLEAN DisplayTitleBarMaximizeGraphic(BOOLEAN fForward, BOOLEAN fInit, UINT16 usTopLeftX, UINT16 usTopLeftY, UINT16 usTopRightX )
04549 {
04550       static      INT8              ubCount;
04551       INT16       sPosX, sPosY, sPosRightX, sPosBottomY, sWidth, sHeight;
04552       SGPRect           SrcRect;
04553       SGPRect           DestRect;
04554       static SGPRect          LastRect;
04555       FLOAT dTemp;
04556 
04557 
04558       if( fInit )
04559       {
04560             if( gfTitleBarSurfaceAlreadyActive )
04561                               return(FALSE);
04562 
04563             gfTitleBarSurfaceAlreadyActive=TRUE;
04564             if( fForward )
04565             {
04566                   ubCount = 1;
04567             }
04568             else
04569             {
04570                   ubCount = NUMBER_OF_LAPTOP_TITLEBAR_ITERATIONS - 1;
04571             }
04572       }
04573 
04574             dTemp = (LAPTOP_TITLE_BAR_TOP_LEFT_X - usTopLeftX) / (FLOAT)NUMBER_OF_LAPTOP_TITLEBAR_ITERATIONS;
04575             sPosX = (INT16)(usTopLeftX + dTemp * ubCount);
04576 
04577             dTemp = (LAPTOP_TITLE_BAR_TOP_RIGHT_X - usTopRightX) / (FLOAT)NUMBER_OF_LAPTOP_TITLEBAR_ITERATIONS;
04578             sPosRightX = (INT16)(usTopRightX + dTemp * ubCount);
04579 
04580             dTemp = ( LAPTOP_TITLE_BAR_TOP_LEFT_Y - usTopLeftY ) / (FLOAT)NUMBER_OF_LAPTOP_TITLEBAR_ITERATIONS;
04581             sPosY =  (INT16)(usTopLeftY + dTemp * ubCount);
04582 
04583 
04584       sPosBottomY = LAPTOP_TITLE_BAR_HEIGHT;
04585 
04586       SrcRect.iLeft = 0;
04587       SrcRect.iTop = 0;
04588       SrcRect.iRight = LAPTOP_TITLE_BAR_WIDTH;
04589       SrcRect.iBottom = LAPTOP_TITLE_BAR_HEIGHT;
04590 
04591       //if its the last fram, bit the tittle bar to the final position
04592       if( ubCount == NUMBER_OF_LAPTOP_TITLEBAR_ITERATIONS)
04593       {
04594             DestRect.iLeft = LAPTOP_TITLE_BAR_TOP_LEFT_X;
04595             DestRect.iTop = LAPTOP_TITLE_BAR_TOP_LEFT_Y;
04596             DestRect.iRight = LAPTOP_TITLE_BAR_TOP_RIGHT_X;
04597             DestRect.iBottom = DestRect.iTop + sPosBottomY;
04598       }
04599       else
04600       {
04601             DestRect.iLeft = sPosX;
04602             DestRect.iTop = sPosY;
04603             DestRect.iRight = sPosRightX;
04604             DestRect.iBottom = DestRect.iTop + sPosBottomY;
04605       }
04606 
04607       
04608 
04609       if( fForward )
04610       {
04611             //Restore the old rect
04612             if( ubCount > 1 )
04613             {
04614                   sWidth = (UINT16)(LastRect.iRight - LastRect.iLeft);
04615                   sHeight = (UINT16)(LastRect.iBottom - LastRect.iTop);
04616                   BlitBufferToBuffer(guiSAVEBUFFER, guiRENDERBUFFER, (UINT16)LastRect.iLeft, (UINT16)LastRect.iTop, sWidth, sHeight);
04617             }
04618 
04619             //Save rectangle
04620             if( ubCount > 0 )
04621             {
04622                   sWidth = (UINT16)(DestRect.iRight - DestRect.iLeft);
04623                   sHeight = (UINT16)(DestRect.iBottom - DestRect.iTop);
04624                   BlitBufferToBuffer(guiRENDERBUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, (UINT16)DestRect.iLeft, (UINT16)DestRect.iTop, sWidth, sHeight);
04625             }
04626       }
04627       else
04628       {
04629             //Restore the old rect
04630             if( ubCount < NUMBER_OF_LAPTOP_TITLEBAR_ITERATIONS - 1 )
04631             {
04632                   sWidth = (UINT16)(LastRect.iRight - LastRect.iLeft);
04633                   sHeight = (UINT16)(LastRect.iBottom - LastRect.iTop);
04634                   BlitBufferToBuffer(guiSAVEBUFFER, guiRENDERBUFFER, (UINT16)LastRect.iLeft, (UINT16)LastRect.iTop, sWidth, sHeight);
04635             }
04636 
04637             //Save rectangle
04638             if( ubCount < NUMBER_OF_LAPTOP_TITLEBAR_ITERATIONS )
04639             {
04640                   sWidth = (UINT16)(DestRect.iRight - DestRect.iLeft);
04641                   sHeight = (UINT16)(DestRect.iBottom - DestRect.iTop);
04642                   BlitBufferToBuffer(guiRENDERBUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, (UINT16)DestRect.iLeft, (UINT16)DestRect.iTop, sWidth, sHeight);
04643             }
04644       }
04645 
04646 
04647       BltStretchVideoSurface(FRAME_BUFFER, guiTitleBarSurface, 0, 0, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, &SrcRect, &DestRect );
04648   
04649       InvalidateRegion(DestRect.iLeft,DestRect.iTop, DestRect.iRight, DestRect.iBottom);
04650       InvalidateRegion(LastRect.iLeft,LastRect.iTop, LastRect.iRight, LastRect.iBottom);
04651 
04652       LastRect = DestRect;
04653 
04654       if( fForward )
04655       {
04656             if( ubCount == NUMBER_OF_LAPTOP_TITLEBAR_ITERATIONS)
04657             {
04658                   gfTitleBarSurfaceAlreadyActive=FALSE;
04659                   return(TRUE);
04660             }
04661             else
04662             {
04663                   ubCount++;
04664                   return(FALSE);
04665             }
04666       }
04667       else
04668       {
04669             if( ubCount == 0)
04670             {
04671                   gfTitleBarSurfaceAlreadyActive=FALSE;
04672                   return(TRUE);
04673             }
04674             else
04675             {
04676                   ubCount--;
04677                   return(FALSE);
04678             }
04679       }
04680 
04681       return(TRUE);
04682 }
04683 
04684 void RemoveTitleBarMaximizeGraphics()
04685 {
04686       DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex( guiTitleBarSurface );
04687 }

04689 
04690 void HandleSlidingTitleBar( void )
04691 {
04692       if( ( fMaximizingProgram == FALSE ) && ( fMinizingProgram == FALSE ) )
04693       {
04694             return;
04695       }
04696 
04697       if( fExitingLaptopFlag )
04698       {
04699             return;
04700       }
04701 
04702       if( fMaximizingProgram )
04703       {
04704             switch( bProgramBeingMaximized )
04705             {
04706                   case( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MAILER ):
04707 
04708                    fMaximizingProgram = !DisplayTitleBarMaximizeGraphic( TRUE, fInitTitle, iScreenWidthOffset + 29,
04709                          iScreenHeightOffset + 66, iScreenWidthOffset + 49 );
04710                    
04711                    //fMaximizingProgram = !DisplayTitleBarMaximizeGraphic( TRUE, fInitTitle, 29, 66, 29 + 20 );
04712 
04713                    if( fMaximizingProgram  == FALSE )
04714                    {
04715                          RemoveTitleBarMaximizeGraphics();
04716                          fEnteredNewLapTopDueToHandleSlidingBars = TRUE;
04717                          EnterNewLaptopMode();
04718                          fEnteredNewLapTopDueToHandleSlidingBars = FALSE;
04719                          fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04720                    }
04721                    break;
04722 
04723                    case( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_FILES ):
04724                    fMaximizingProgram = !DisplayTitleBarMaximizeGraphic( TRUE, fInitTitle, iScreenWidthOffset + 29,
04725                          iScreenHeightOffset + 120, iScreenWidthOffset + 29 + 20 );
04726                    if( fMaximizingProgram  == FALSE )
04727                    {
04728                          RemoveTitleBarMaximizeGraphics();
04729                          fEnteredNewLapTopDueToHandleSlidingBars = TRUE;
04730                          EnterNewLaptopMode();
04731                          fEnteredNewLapTopDueToHandleSlidingBars = FALSE;
04732                          fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04733                    }
04734                    break;
04735                    case( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_FINANCES ):
04736                    fMaximizingProgram = !DisplayTitleBarMaximizeGraphic( TRUE, fInitTitle, iScreenWidthOffset + 29, 
04737                          iScreenHeightOffset + 226, iScreenWidthOffset + 29 + 20 );
04738                    if( fMaximizingProgram  == FALSE )
04739                    {
04740                          RemoveTitleBarMaximizeGraphics();
04741                          fEnteredNewLapTopDueToHandleSlidingBars = TRUE;
04742                          EnterNewLaptopMode();
04743                          fEnteredNewLapTopDueToHandleSlidingBars = FALSE;
04744                          fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04745                    }
04746                    break;
04747                    case( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_PERSONNEL ):
04748                    fMaximizingProgram = !DisplayTitleBarMaximizeGraphic( TRUE, fInitTitle, iScreenWidthOffset + 29,  
04749                          iScreenHeightOffset + 194, iScreenWidthOffset + 29 + 20 );
04750                    if( fMaximizingProgram  == FALSE )
04751                    {
04752                          RemoveTitleBarMaximizeGraphics();
04753                          fEnteredNewLapTopDueToHandleSlidingBars = TRUE;
04754                          EnterNewLaptopMode();
04755                          fEnteredNewLapTopDueToHandleSlidingBars = FALSE;
04756                          fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04757                    }
04758                    break;
04759                    case( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_HISTORY ):
04760                    fMaximizingProgram = !DisplayTitleBarMaximizeGraphic( TRUE, fInitTitle, iScreenWidthOffset + 29,
04761                          iScreenHeightOffset + 162, iScreenWidthOffset + 29 + 20 );
04762                    if( fMaximizingProgram  == FALSE )
04763                    {
04764                          RemoveTitleBarMaximizeGraphics();
04765                          fEnteredNewLapTopDueToHandleSlidingBars = TRUE;
04766                          EnterNewLaptopMode();
04767                          fEnteredNewLapTopDueToHandleSlidingBars = FALSE;
04768                          fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04769                    }
04770                    break;
04771                     case( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_WEB_BROWSER ):
04772                    fMaximizingProgram = !DisplayTitleBarMaximizeGraphic( TRUE, fInitTitle, iScreenWidthOffset + 29,
04773                          iScreenHeightOffset + 99, iScreenWidthOffset + 29 + 20 );
04774                    if( fMaximizingProgram  == FALSE )
04775                    {
04776                          RemoveTitleBarMaximizeGraphics();
04777                          fEnteredNewLapTopDueToHandleSlidingBars = TRUE;
04778                          EnterNewLaptopMode();
04779                          fEnteredNewLapTopDueToHandleSlidingBars = FALSE;
04780                          fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04781                    }
04782                    break;
04783             }
04784 
04785             MarkButtonsDirty( );
04786       }
04787       else
04788       {
04789             // minimizing
04790             switch( bProgramBeingMaximized )
04791             {
04792                   case( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MAILER ):
04793                    fMinizingProgram = !DisplayTitleBarMaximizeGraphic( FALSE, fInitTitle, iScreenWidthOffset + 29,
04794                          iScreenHeightOffset + 66, iScreenWidthOffset + 29 + 20 );
04795                    if( fMinizingProgram  == FALSE )
04796                    {
04797                          RemoveTitleBarMaximizeGraphics();
04798                          EnterNewLaptopMode();
04799                          fEnteredNewLapTopDueToHandleSlidingBars = FALSE;
04800                          fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04801                    }
04802                    break;
04803                    case( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_FILES ):
04804                    fMinizingProgram = !DisplayTitleBarMaximizeGraphic( FALSE, fInitTitle, iScreenWidthOffset + 29,
04805                          iScreenHeightOffset + 130, iScreenWidthOffset + 29 + 20 );
04806                    if( fMinizingProgram  == FALSE )
04807                    {
04808                          RemoveTitleBarMaximizeGraphics();
04809                          EnterNewLaptopMode();
04810                          fEnteredNewLapTopDueToHandleSlidingBars = FALSE;
04811                          fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04812                    }
04813                    break;
04814                    case( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_FINANCES ):
04815                    fMinizingProgram = !DisplayTitleBarMaximizeGraphic( FALSE, fInitTitle, iScreenWidthOffset + 29,
04816                          iScreenHeightOffset + 226, iScreenWidthOffset + 29 + 20 );
04817                    if( fMinizingProgram  == FALSE )
04818                    {
04819                          RemoveTitleBarMaximizeGraphics();
04820                          EnterNewLaptopMode();
04821                          fEnteredNewLapTopDueToHandleSlidingBars = FALSE;
04822                          fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04823                    }
04824                    break;
04825                    case( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_PERSONNEL ):
04826                    fMinizingProgram = !DisplayTitleBarMaximizeGraphic( FALSE, fInitTitle, iScreenWidthOffset + 29,
04827                          iScreenHeightOffset + 194, iScreenWidthOffset + 29 + 20 );
04828                    if( fMinizingProgram  == FALSE )
04829                    {
04830                          RemoveTitleBarMaximizeGraphics();
04831                          EnterNewLaptopMode();
04832                          fEnteredNewLapTopDueToHandleSlidingBars = FALSE;
04833                          fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04834                    }
04835                    break;
04836                    case( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_HISTORY ):
04837                    fMinizingProgram = !DisplayTitleBarMaximizeGraphic( FALSE, fInitTitle, iScreenWidthOffset + 29,
04838                          iScreenHeightOffset + 162 , iScreenWidthOffset + 29 + 20 );
04839                    if( fMinizingProgram  == FALSE )
04840                    {
04841                          RemoveTitleBarMaximizeGraphics();
04842                          EnterNewLaptopMode();
04843                          fEnteredNewLapTopDueToHandleSlidingBars = FALSE;
04844                          fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04845                    }
04846                    break;
04847                     case( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_WEB_BROWSER ):
04848                    fMinizingProgram = !DisplayTitleBarMaximizeGraphic( FALSE, fInitTitle, iScreenWidthOffset + 29,
04849                         iScreenHeightOffset +  99 , iScreenWidthOffset + 29 + 20 );
04850                    if( fMinizingProgram  == FALSE )
04851                    {
04852                          RemoveTitleBarMaximizeGraphics();
04853                          EnterNewLaptopMode();
04854                          fEnteredNewLapTopDueToHandleSlidingBars = FALSE;
04855                          fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
04856                    }
04857                    break;
04858             }
04859       }
04860 
04861 
04862       // reset init
04863       fInitTitle = FALSE;
04864 }

04867 void ShowLights( void )
04868 {
04869       // will show lights depending on state
04870   HVOBJECT hHandle;
04871 
04872       if( fPowerLightOn == TRUE )
04873       {
04874             GetVideoObject( &hHandle, guiLIGHTS);
04875             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,iScreenWidthOffset + 44, iScreenHeightOffset + 466,  VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
04876       }
04877       else
04878       {
04879             GetVideoObject( &hHandle, guiLIGHTS);
04880             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 1,iScreenWidthOffset + 44, iScreenHeightOffset + 466, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
04881       }
04882 
04883   if( fHardDriveLightOn == TRUE )
04884       {
04885             GetVideoObject( &hHandle, guiLIGHTS);
04886             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0, iScreenWidthOffset + 88, iScreenHeightOffset + 466, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
04887       }
04888       else
04889       {
04890             GetVideoObject( &hHandle, guiLIGHTS);
04891             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 1, iScreenWidthOffset + 88, iScreenHeightOffset + 466,  VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
04892       }
04893 
04894   
04895 }
04896 
04897 
04898 void FlickerHDLight( void )
04899 {
04900       static INT32 iBaseTime = 0;
04901       static INT32 iTotalDifference = 0;
04902       INT32 iDifference = 0;
04903 
04904       if( fLoadPendingFlag == TRUE )
04905       {
04906             fFlickerHD = TRUE;
04907       }
04908 
04909       if( fFlickerHD == FALSE )
04910       {
04911             return;
04912       }
04913 
04914 
04915       if( iBaseTime == 0 )
04916       {
04917             iBaseTime = GetJA2Clock( );
04918       }
04919 
04920       iDifference = GetJA2Clock( ) - iBaseTime;
04921       
04922       if( ( iTotalDifference > HD_FLICKER_TIME ) && ( fLoadPendingFlag == FALSE ) )
04923       {
04924             iBaseTime = GetJA2Clock( );
04925             fHardDriveLightOn = FALSE;
04926             iBaseTime = 0;
04927             iTotalDifference = 0;
04928             fFlickerHD = FALSE;
04929             InvalidateRegion(iScreenWidthOffset + 88, iScreenHeightOffset + 466, 
04930                   iScreenWidthOffset + 102, iScreenHeightOffset + 477 );
04931             return;
04932       }
04933 
04934       if( iDifference > FLICKER_TIME )
04935       {
04936             iTotalDifference += iDifference;
04937             
04938             if( fLoadPendingFlag == TRUE )
04939             {
04940                   iTotalDifference = 0;
04941             }
04942             
04943             if( ( Random( 2 ) ) == 0 )
04944             {
04945               fHardDriveLightOn = TRUE;
04946             }
04947         else
04948             {
04949               fHardDriveLightOn = FALSE;
04950             }
04951             InvalidateRegion(iScreenWidthOffset + 88, iScreenHeightOffset + 466,
04952                   iScreenWidthOffset + 102, iScreenHeightOffset + 477 );
04953       }
04954       
04955       return;
04956 }
04957 
04958 
04959 BOOLEAN ExitLaptopDone( void )
04960 {
04961       // check if this is the first time, to reset counter
04962 
04963       static BOOLEAN fOldLeaveLaptopState = FALSE;
04964       static INT32 iBaseTime = 0;
04965       INT32 iDifference = 0;
04966 
04967       if( fOldLeaveLaptopState == FALSE )
04968       {
04969             fOldLeaveLaptopState = TRUE;
04970             iBaseTime = GetJA2Clock( );
04971       }
04972 
04973       fPowerLightOn = FALSE;
04974 
04975       
04976   InvalidateRegion(iScreenWidthOffset + 44, iScreenHeightOffset + 466,
04977         iScreenWidthOffset + 58, iScreenHeightOffset + 477 );
04978       // get the current difference
04979       iDifference = GetJA2Clock( ) - iBaseTime;
04980 
04981 
04982       // did we wait long enough?
04983       if( iDifference > EXIT_LAPTOP_DELAY_TIME )
04984       {
04985             iBaseTime = 0;
04986             fOldLeaveLaptopState = FALSE;
04987             return TRUE;
04988       }
04989       else
04990       {
04991             return FALSE;
04992       }
04993 
04994 }
04995 
04996 
04997 void CreateDestroyMinimizeButtonForCurrentMode( void )
04998 {
04999       // will create the minimize button
05000   
05001       static BOOLEAN fAlreadyCreated = FALSE;
05002       // check to see if created, if so, do nothing
05003 
05004 
05005       // check current mode
05006       if( ( guiCurrentLaptopMode == LAPTOP_MODE_NONE )&&( guiPreviousLaptopMode != LAPTOP_MODE_NONE ) )
05007       {
05008             fCreateMinimizeButton = FALSE;
05009       }
05010       else if( ( guiCurrentLaptopMode != LAPTOP_MODE_NONE ) )
05011       {
05012             fCreateMinimizeButton = TRUE;
05013       }
05014       else if( ( guiPreviousLaptopMode != LAPTOP_MODE_NONE ) )
05015       {
05016             fCreateMinimizeButton = FALSE;
05017       }
05018 
05019       // leaving laptop, get rid of the button
05020       if( fExitingLaptopFlag == TRUE )
05021       {
05022             fCreateMinimizeButton = FALSE;
05023       }
05024 
05025 
05026       if( ( fAlreadyCreated == FALSE ) && ( fCreateMinimizeButton == TRUE ) )
05027       {
05028             // not created, create
05029             fAlreadyCreated = TRUE;
05030             CreateMinimizeButtonForCurrentMode( );
05031             CreateMinimizeRegionsForLaptopProgramIcons( );
05032       }
05033       else if(  ( fAlreadyCreated == TRUE ) && ( fCreateMinimizeButton == FALSE )  )
05034       {
05035             // created and must be destroyed
05036             fAlreadyCreated = FALSE;
05037             DestroyMinimizeButtonForCurrentMode( );
05038             DestroyMinimizeRegionsForLaptopProgramIcons( );
05039 
05040       }
05041       else
05042       {
05043             // do nothing
05044       }
05045 
05046       return;
05047 }
05048 
05049 
05050 void CreateMinimizeButtonForCurrentMode( void )
05051 {
05052       // create minimize button
05053   gLaptopMinButtonImage[0]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\x.sti" ,-1,0,-1,1,-1 );
05054   gLaptopMinButton[0] = QuickCreateButton( gLaptopMinButtonImage[0], iScreenWidthOffset + 590, iScreenHeightOffset + 30,
05055                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
05056                                                             (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)LaptopMinimizeProgramButtonCallback);
05057  
05058       SetButtonCursor(gLaptopMinButton[0], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
05059       return;
05060 }
05061 
05062 void DestroyMinimizeButtonForCurrentMode( void )
05063 {
05064       // destroy minimize button
05065       RemoveButton( gLaptopMinButton[ 0 ] );  
05066       UnloadButtonImage( gLaptopMinButtonImage[ 0 ] );
05067 
05068 }
05069 
05070 
05071 void LaptopMinimizeProgramButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
05072 {
05073       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
05074             return; 
05075       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
05076       {
05077         if(!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON))
05078             {
05079           btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON); 
05080             } 
05081       }
05082       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
05083   {
05084     if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
05085             {
05086               btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
05087 
05088                   switch( guiCurrentLaptopMode )
05089                   {
05090                     case( LAPTOP_MODE_EMAIL ):
05091                               gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MAILER ] = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MINIMIZED;
05092                           InitTitleBarMaximizeGraphics(guiTITLEBARLAPTOP, pLaptopIcons[ 0 ], guiTITLEBARICONS, 0 );
05093                           SetCurrentToLastProgramOpened( );
05094                               fMinizingProgram = TRUE;
05095                               fInitTitle = TRUE;
05096                         break;
05097                         case( LAPTOP_MODE_FILES ):
05098                               gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_FILES ] = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MINIMIZED;
05099                           InitTitleBarMaximizeGraphics(guiTITLEBARLAPTOP, pLaptopIcons[5], guiTITLEBARICONS, 2 );
05100                           SetCurrentToLastProgramOpened( );
05101                               fMinizingProgram = TRUE;
05102                               fInitTitle = TRUE;
05103                         break;
05104                         case( LAPTOP_MODE_FINANCES ):
05105                               gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_FINANCES ] = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MINIMIZED;
05106                           InitTitleBarMaximizeGraphics(guiTITLEBARLAPTOP, pLaptopIcons[ 2 ], guiTITLEBARICONS, 5 );
05107                               SetCurrentToLastProgramOpened( );
05108                               fMinizingProgram = TRUE;
05109                               fInitTitle = TRUE;
05110                         break;
05111                         case( LAPTOP_MODE_HISTORY ):
05112                               gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_HISTORY ] = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MINIMIZED;
05113                           InitTitleBarMaximizeGraphics(guiTITLEBARLAPTOP, pLaptopIcons[4], guiTITLEBARICONS, 4 );
05114                               SetCurrentToLastProgramOpened( );
05115                               fMinizingProgram = TRUE;
05116                               fInitTitle = TRUE;
05117                         break;
05118                         case( LAPTOP_MODE_PERSONNEL ):
05119                               gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_PERSONNEL ] = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MINIMIZED;
05120                           InitTitleBarMaximizeGraphics(guiTITLEBARLAPTOP, pLaptopIcons[3], guiTITLEBARICONS, 3 );
05121                               SetCurrentToLastProgramOpened( );
05122                               fMinizingProgram = TRUE;
05123                               fInitTitle = TRUE;
05124                         break;
05125                         case( LAPTOP_MODE_NONE ):
05126                          // nothing
05127                         break;
05128                         default:
05129                               gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_WEB_BROWSER ] = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MINIMIZED;
05130                           InitTitleBarMaximizeGraphics(guiTITLEBARLAPTOP, pLaptopIcons[ 7 ], guiTITLEBARICONS, 1 );
05131                               SetCurrentToLastProgramOpened( );
05132                               gfShowBookmarks = FALSE;
05133                               fMinizingProgram = TRUE;
05134                               fInitTitle = TRUE;
05135                         break;
05136                   }
05137             }
05138       }
05139 } 
05140 
05141 INT32 FindLastProgramStillOpen( void )
05142 {
05143       INT32 iLowestValue = 6;
05144       INT32 iLowestValueProgram = 6;
05145       INT32 iCounter =0;
05146 
05147       // returns ID of last program open and not minimized
05148       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 6; iCounter++ )
05149       {
05150             if( gLaptopProgramStates[ iCounter ] != LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MINIMIZED )
05151             {
05152                   if( gLaptopProgramQueueList[ iCounter ] < iLowestValue )
05153                   {
05154                         iLowestValue = gLaptopProgramQueueList[ iCounter ];
05155                         iLowestValueProgram = iCounter;
05156                   }
05157             }
05158       }
05159 
05160       return ( iLowestValueProgram );
05161 }
05162 
05163 void UpdateListToReflectNewProgramOpened( INT32 iOpenedProgram )
05164 {
05165       INT32 iCounter = 0;
05166   
05167       // will update queue of opened programs to show thier states
05168       // set iOpenedProgram to 1, and update others
05169 
05170       // increment everyone
05171       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 6; iCounter++ )
05172       {
05173                   gLaptopProgramQueueList[ iCounter ]++;
05174       }
05175 
05176       gLaptopProgramQueueList[ iOpenedProgram ] = 1;
05177 
05178       return;
05179 }
05180 
05181 
05182 void InitLaptopOpenQueue( void )
05183 {
05184 
05185       INT32 iCounter = 0;
05186 
05187       // set evereyone to 1
05188       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < 6; iCounter++ )
05189       {
05190                   gLaptopProgramQueueList[ iCounter ] = 1;
05191       }
05192 
05193       return;
05194 }
05195 
05196 void SetCurrentToLastProgramOpened( void )
05197 {
05198       guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_NONE;
05199 
05200       switch( FindLastProgramStillOpen( ) )
05201       {
05202             case(LAPTOP_PROGRAM_HISTORY ):
05203                         guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_HISTORY;
05204             break;
05205             case( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MAILER ):
05206        guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_EMAIL;
05207             break;
05208             case( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_PERSONNEL ):
05209                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_PERSONNEL;
05210             break;
05211             case( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_FINANCES ):
05212                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_FINANCES;
05213             break;
05214             case( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_FILES ):
05215                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_FILES;
05216             break;
05217             case( LAPTOP_PROGRAM_WEB_BROWSER ):
05218             // last www mode
05219                   if( guiCurrentWWWMode != 0 )
05220                   {
05221                     guiCurrentLaptopMode = guiCurrentWWWMode;
05222                   }
05223                   else
05224                   {
05225                         guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_WWW;
05226                   }
05227                   //gfShowBookmarks = TRUE;
05228                   fShowBookmarkInfo = TRUE;
05229             break;
05230       }
05231 
05232 
05233 
05234 }
05235 
05236 
05237 void BlitTitleBarIcons( void )
05238 {
05239 
05240       HVOBJECT hHandle;
05241       // will blit the icons for the title bar of the program we are in
05242       switch( guiCurrentLaptopMode )
05243       {
05244             case( LAPTOP_MODE_HISTORY ):
05245                         GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiTITLEBARICONS);
05246             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 4,LAPTOP_TITLE_ICONS_X, LAPTOP_TITLE_ICONS_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
05247             break;
05248             case( LAPTOP_MODE_EMAIL ):
05249                     GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiTITLEBARICONS);
05250             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,LAPTOP_TITLE_ICONS_X, LAPTOP_TITLE_ICONS_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
05251             break;
05252             case( LAPTOP_MODE_PERSONNEL ):
05253                    GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiTITLEBARICONS);
05254            BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 3,LAPTOP_TITLE_ICONS_X, LAPTOP_TITLE_ICONS_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
05255             break;
05256             case( LAPTOP_MODE_FINANCES ):
05257                    GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiTITLEBARICONS);
05258            BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 5,LAPTOP_TITLE_ICONS_X, LAPTOP_TITLE_ICONS_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
05259             break;
05260             case( LAPTOP_MODE_FILES ):
05261                    GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiTITLEBARICONS);
05262            BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 2,LAPTOP_TITLE_ICONS_X, LAPTOP_TITLE_ICONS_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
05263             break;
05264             case( LAPTOP_MODE_NONE ):
05265               // do nothing
05266             break;
05267             default:
05268                   // www pages
05269                   GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiTITLEBARICONS);
05270           BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 1,LAPTOP_TITLE_ICONS_X, LAPTOP_TITLE_ICONS_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
05271             break;
05272 
05273       }
05274 }
05275 
05276 
05277 BOOLEAN DrawDeskTopBackground( void )
05278 {
05279       HVSURFACE hSrcVSurface;
05280   UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
05281       UINT32 uiSrcPitchBYTES;
05282   UINT16  *pDestBuf;
05283       UINT8  *pSrcBuf;
05284       SGPRect clip;
05285 
05286        // set clipping region
05287        // WANNE (if i change this values to SCREEN_WIDTH, ... than an exception is thrown in the vobject_blitters.cpp)
05288        // -> no changes to clip structure
05289        clip.iLeft = 0;                          
05290        clip.iRight = 506;                 
05291        clip.iTop = 0;   
05292        clip.iBottom = 427;
05293 
05294 
05295       // get surfaces
05296       pDestBuf = (UINT16*)LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
05297       CHECKF( GetVideoSurface( &hSrcVSurface, guiDESKTOP) );
05298       pSrcBuf = LockVideoSurface( guiDESKTOP, &uiSrcPitchBYTES);
05299       
05300       
05301       // blit .pcx for the background onto desktop
05302       Blt8BPPDataSubTo16BPPBuffer( pDestBuf,  uiDestPitchBYTES, hSrcVSurface, pSrcBuf,uiSrcPitchBYTES, LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X - 2, LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_Y - 3, &clip);
05303 
05304 
05305       // release surfaces
05306       UnLockVideoSurface( guiDESKTOP );
05307   UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
05308 
05309       return ( TRUE );
05310 }
05311

05313 BOOLEAN LoadDesktopBackground( void )
05314 {
05315       // load desktop background
05316       VSURFACE_DESC           vs_desc;
05317 
05318   vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_FROMFILE | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
05319       GetMLGFilename( vs_desc.ImageFile, MLG_DESKTOP );
05320   CHECKF(AddVideoSurface(&vs_desc, &guiDESKTOP));
05321 
05322 
05323       return( TRUE );
05324 }
05325 
05326 void DeleteDesktopBackground( void )

05328       // delete desktop
05329 
05330       DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex(guiDESKTOP);
05331       return;
05332 }

05335 void PrintBalance( void )
05336 {
05337   CHAR16 pString[ 32 ];
05338 //    UINT16 usX, usY;
05339 
05340       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
05341       SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
05342       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
05343       SetFontShadow( NO_SHADOW );
05344 
05345       swprintf(pString, L"%d", LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance);
05346       InsertCommasForDollarFigure( pString );
05347       InsertDollarSignInToString( pString );
05348       
05349       if( ButtonList[ gLaptopButton[ 5 ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON )
05350       {
05351             mprintf(iScreenWidthOffset + 48, iScreenHeightOffset + 273,pString);
05352       }
05353       else
05354       {
05355             mprintf(iScreenWidthOffset + 47, iScreenHeightOffset + 272,pString);
05356       }
05357 
05358 
05359       SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
05360 }
