05362 
05363 void PrintNumberOnTeam( void )
05364 {
05365   CHAR16 pString[ 32 ];
05366       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, *pTeamSoldier;
05367   INT32 cnt=0;
05368       INT32 iCounter=0;
05369       UINT16 usPosX, usPosY, usFontHeight, usStrLength;
05370 
05371 
05372       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
05373       SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
05374       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
05375       SetFontShadow( NO_SHADOW );
05376 
05377       // grab number on team
05378       pSoldier = MercPtrs[0]; 
05379       
05380       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bLastID; cnt++, pTeamSoldier++)
05381       {
05382             pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ];
05383 
05384             if( ( pTeamSoldier->bActive)&&( !( pTeamSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) ) )
05385             {
05386                     iCounter++;
05387             }
05388       }
05389 
05390 
05391       swprintf( pString, L"%s %d",pPersonnelString[ 0 ], iCounter );
05392 
05393       usFontHeight = GetFontHeight( FONT10ARIAL );
05394       usStrLength = StringPixLength( pString, FONT10ARIAL );
05395 
05396       if( ButtonList[ gLaptopButton[ 3 ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON )
05397       {
05398             usPosX = iScreenWidthOffset + 48;
05399             usPosY = iScreenHeightOffset + 225;
05400       }
05401       else
05402       {
05403             usPosX = iScreenWidthOffset + 47;
05404             usPosY = iScreenHeightOffset + 224;
05405       }
05406 
05407       mprintf( usPosX, usPosY, pString);
05408       
05409       SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
05410 }
05411 
05412 void PrintDate( void )
05413 {
05414       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
05415       SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
05416       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
05417 
05418       SetFontShadow( NO_SHADOW );
05419 
05420       mprintf( iScreenWidthOffset + 30 + (70 - StringPixLength( WORLDTIMESTR, FONT10ARIAL ))/2, iScreenHeightOffset + 433, WORLDTIMESTR );
05421 
05422       SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
05423 
05424       return;
05425 }

05428 void DisplayTaskBarIcons()
05429 {
05430       HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
05431 
05432       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiTITLEBARICONS);
05433 
05434       if( fNewFilesInFileViewer )
05435       {
05436             //display the files icon, if there is any
05437         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 7,LAPTOP__NEW_FILE_ICON_X, LAPTOP__NEW_FILE_ICON_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
05438       }
05439 
05440       //display the email icon, if there is email
05441       if( fUnReadMailFlag )
05442       {
05443             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 6, LAPTOP__NEW_EMAIL_ICON_X, LAPTOP__NEW_EMAIL_ICON_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
05444       }

05447 
05448 void HandleKeyBoardShortCutsForLapTop( UINT16 usEvent, UINT32 usParam, UINT16 usKeyState )
05449 {
05450 
05451       // will handle keyboard shortcuts for the laptop ... to be added to later
05452 
05453       if( ( fExitingLaptopFlag == TRUE )||( fTabHandled ) )
05454       {
05455             return;
05456       }
05457 
05458       if ( (usEvent == KEY_DOWN ) && (usParam == ESC ) )
05459       {
05460       // esc hit, check to see if boomark list is shown, if so, get rid of it, otherwise, leave
05461     HandleLapTopESCKey( );
05462       }
05463       else if( (usEvent == KEY_DOWN ) && ( usParam == TAB ) )
05464       {
05465             if(usKeyState & CTRL_DOWN )
05466             {
05467                   HandleShiftAltTabKeyInLaptop( );
05468             }
05469             else
05470             {
05471                   HandleAltTabKeyInLaptop( );
05472             }
05473 
05474             fTabHandled = TRUE;
05475       }
05476 
05477 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05478 
05479       else if ((usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( usParam == 'm' ) )
05480       {     
05481             if( ( usKeyState & ALT_DOWN ) )
05482             {
05483                         CheatToGetAll5Merc();
05484             }
05485       }
05486 #endif
05487 
05488       else if( (usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( usParam == 'b' ) )
05489       {
05490             if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
05491             {
05492                   if( ( usKeyState & ALT_DOWN ) )
05493                         LaptopSaveInfo.fBobbyRSiteCanBeAccessed = TRUE;
05494                   else if( usKeyState & CTRL_DOWN )
05495                   {
05496                         guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_BROKEN_LINK;
05497                   }
05498             }
05499       }
05500 
05501       else if ((usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( usParam == 'x' ) )
05502       {     
05503             if( ( usKeyState & ALT_DOWN ) )
05504             {
05505       HandleShortCutExitState( );
05506             }
05507                //LeaveLapTopScreen( );           
05508       }
05509 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05510       else if ((usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( usParam == 'q' ))
05511       {
05512                   //if we dont currently have mercs on the team, hire some
05513                   if( NumberOfMercsOnPlayerTeam() == 0 )
05514                   {
05515                         UINT8 ubRand = (UINT8) Random( 2 ) + 2;
05516                         TempHiringOfMercs( ubRand, FALSE );
05517                   //    QuickStartGame( );
05518                   }
05519                   MarkButtonsDirty( );
05520                   fExitingLaptopFlag = TRUE;
05521       }
05522       else if ((usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( usParam == 's' ))
05523       {     
05524                   if( ( usKeyState & ALT_DOWN ) )
05525                   {
05526                         SetBookMark( AIM_BOOKMARK );
05527                         SetBookMark( BOBBYR_BOOKMARK );
05528                         SetBookMark( IMP_BOOKMARK );
05529                         SetBookMark( MERC_BOOKMARK );
05530                         SetBookMark( FUNERAL_BOOKMARK );
05531                         SetBookMark( FLORIST_BOOKMARK );
05532                         SetBookMark( INSURANCE_BOOKMARK );
05533                   }
05534       }
05535 
05536       //help screen stuff
05537       else 
05538 #endif
05539       if( (usEvent == KEY_DOWN ) && ( ( usParam == 'h' ) || ( usParam == 'H' ) ) )
05540       {
05541             ShouldTheHelpScreenComeUp( HELP_SCREEN_LAPTOP, TRUE );
05542       }
05543 
05544 
05545 #if defined ( JA2TESTVERSION )
05546       else if ((usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( usParam == 'w' ))
05547       {
05548             DemoHiringOfMercs( );
05549       }
05550 #endif
05551 
05552 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
05553       //adding all emails
05554       else if ((usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( usParam == 'e' ))
05555       {
05556             if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
05557             {
05558                   if( ( usKeyState & ALT_DOWN ) )
05559                   {
05560                         AddAllEmails();
05561                   }
05562             }
05563       }
05564 #endif
05565 
05566       //adding money
05567       else if ((usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( usParam == '=' ))
05568       {
05569             if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
05570             {
05571                   AddTransactionToPlayersBook( ANONYMOUS_DEPOSIT, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), 100000 );
05572                   MarkButtonsDirty( );
05573             }
05574       }
05575 
05576       //subtracting money
05577       else if( (usEvent == KEY_DOWN ) && ( usParam == '-' ) )
05578       {
05579             if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
05580             {
05581                   AddTransactionToPlayersBook( ANONYMOUS_DEPOSIT, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), -10000 );
05582                   MarkButtonsDirty( );
05583             }
05584       }
05585 
05586 
05587 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
05588       else if ((usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( usParam == 'd' ))
05589       {     
05590             if( gfTemporaryDisablingOfLoadPendingFlag )
05591                   gfTemporaryDisablingOfLoadPendingFlag = FALSE;
05592             else
05593                   gfTemporaryDisablingOfLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
05594       }
05595       else if ((usEvent == KEY_DOWN ) && ( usParam == '+' ))
05596       {
05597             if( usKeyState & ALT_DOWN )
05598             {
05599                   gStrategicStatus.ubHighestProgress += 10;
05600                   if (gStrategicStatus.ubHighestProgress > 100)
05601                         gStrategicStatus.ubHighestProgress = 100;
05602 
05603                   InitAllArmsDealers();
05604                   InitBobbyRayInventory();
05605             }
05606       }
05607       else if ((usEvent == KEY_DOWN ) && ( usParam == '-' ))
05608       {
05609             if( usKeyState & ALT_DOWN )
05610             {
05611                   if (gStrategicStatus.ubHighestProgress >= 10)
05612                         gStrategicStatus.ubHighestProgress -= 10;
05613                   else
05614                         gStrategicStatus.ubHighestProgress = 0;
05615 
05616                   InitAllArmsDealers();
05617                   InitBobbyRayInventory();
05618             }
05619       }
05620       else if ((usEvent == KEY_DOWN ) && ( usParam == '*' ))
05621       {
05622             if( usKeyState & ALT_DOWN )
05623             {
05624                   DeleteAllStrategicEventsOfType( EVENT_EVALUATE_QUEEN_SITUATION );
05625                   AdvanceToNextDay();
05626             }
05627       }
05628       else if( usEvent == KEY_DOWN && usParam == 'v' && usKeyState & CTRL_DOWN )
05629       {
05630             #ifdef SGP_VIDEO_DEBUGGING
05631                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"VObjects:  %d", guiVObjectSize );
05632                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"VSurfaces:  %d", guiVSurfaceSize );
05633                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"SGPVideoDump.txt updated..." );
05634                   PerformVideoInfoDumpIntoFile( "SGPVideoDump.txt", TRUE );
05635             #endif
05636       }
05637       else
05638       {
05639             if ((usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( usParam == '1' ))
05640             {
05641                   TempHiringOfMercs( 1, FALSE );
05642             }
05643 
05644             if ((usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( usParam == '2' ))
05645             {
05646                   TempHiringOfMercs( 2, FALSE );
05647             }
05648 
05649             if ((usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( usParam == '3' ))
05650             {
05651                   TempHiringOfMercs( 3, FALSE );
05652             }
05653 
05654             if ((usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( usParam == '4' ))
05655             {
05656                   TempHiringOfMercs( 4, FALSE );
05657             }
05658 
05659             if ((usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( usParam == '5' ))
05660             {
05661                   TempHiringOfMercs( 5, FALSE );
05662             }
05663 
05664             if ((usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( usParam == '6' ))
05665             {
05666                   TempHiringOfMercs( 6, FALSE );
05667             }
05668 
05669             if ((usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( usParam == '7' ))
05670             {
05671                   TempHiringOfMercs( 7, FALSE );
05672             }
05673 
05674             if ((usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( usParam == '8' ))
05675             {
05676                   TempHiringOfMercs( 8, FALSE);
05677             }
05678 
05679             if ((usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( usParam == '9' ))
05680             {
05681                   TempHiringOfMercs( 9, FALSE );
05682             }
05683 
05684             if ((usEvent == KEY_DOWN )&& ( usParam == '0' ))
05685             {
05686                   TempHiringOfMercs( 10, FALSE );
05687             }
05688       }
05689 #endif
05690 
05691             return;
05692 }
05693 
05694 
05695 BOOLEAN RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( void )
05696 {
05697       // will render the title bar for the www program
05698   UINT32 uiTITLEFORWWW;
05699       HVOBJECT hHandle;
05700   VOBJECT_DESC VObjectDesc;
05701       INT32 iIndex = 0;
05702       CHAR16 sString[256];
05703 
05704        // title bar - load
05705   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
05706       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\programtitlebar.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
05707       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &uiTITLEFORWWW));
05708 
05709       // blit title
05710   GetVideoObject(&hHandle, uiTITLEFORWWW);
05711   BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0,LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X, LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_Y - 2, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
05712   
05713 
05714       // now delete
05715       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiTITLEFORWWW );
05716 
05717       // now slapdown text
05718       SetFont( FONT14ARIAL );
05719       SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
05720       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
05721 
05722   // display title
05723 
05724       // no page loaded yet, do not handle yet
05725 
05726 
05727       if( guiCurrentLaptopMode == LAPTOP_MODE_WWW )
05728       {
05729         mprintf(iScreenWidthOffset + 140 , iScreenHeightOffset + 33 ,pWebTitle[0]);
05730       }
05731             
05732       else
05733       {
05734             iIndex = guiCurrentLaptopMode - LAPTOP_MODE_WWW-1;
05735 
05736             swprintf( sString, L"%s  -  %s", pWebTitle[0], pWebPagesTitles[ iIndex ] );
05737             mprintf(iScreenWidthOffset + 140 ,iScreenHeightOffset + 33 ,sString);
05738       }
05739       
05740 
05741       
05742 
05743       BlitTitleBarIcons( );
05744 
05745       DisplayProgramBoundingBox( FALSE );
05746       
05747       //InvalidateRegion( 0, 0, 640, 480 );
05748       return( TRUE );
05749 }
05750 
05751 
05752 void HandleDefaultWebpageForLaptop( void )
05753 {
05754 
05755       // go to first page in bookmark list
05756       if( guiCurrentLaptopMode == LAPTOP_MODE_WWW )
05757       {
05758             // if valid entry go there 
05759             if( LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList[ 0 ] != -1 )
05760             {
05761               GoToWebPage( LaptopSaveInfo.iBookMarkList[ 0 ] );
05762             }
05763       }
05764 
05765       return;
05766 }

05768 
05769 void CreateMinimizeRegionsForLaptopProgramIcons( void )
05770 {
05771       // will create the minizing region to lie over the icon for this particular laptop program
05772 
05773        MSYS_DefineRegion( &gLapTopProgramMinIcon,LAPTOP_PROGRAM_ICON_X, LAPTOP_PROGRAM_ICON_Y ,LAPTOP_PROGRAM_ICON_X + LAPTOP_PROGRAM_ICON_WIDTH ,LAPTOP_PROGRAM_ICON_Y + LAPTOP_PROGRAM_ICON_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL+1,
05774                                           CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, LaptopProgramIconMinimizeCallback ); 
05775 
05776       return;
05777 }
05778 
05779 
05780 void DestroyMinimizeRegionsForLaptopProgramIcons( void )
05781 {
05782       // will destroy the minizmize regions to be placed over the laptop icons that will be 
05783       // displayed on the top of the laptop program bar
05784       
05785       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gLapTopProgramMinIcon);
05786 
05787       return;
05788 }
05789 
05790 
05791 void LaptopProgramIconMinimizeCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
05792 {
05793       // callback handler for the minize region that is attatched to the laptop program icon
05794       if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
05795   {
05796                   switch( guiCurrentLaptopMode )
05797                   {
05798                     case( LAPTOP_MODE_EMAIL ):
05799                               gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MAILER ] = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MINIMIZED;
05800                           InitTitleBarMaximizeGraphics(guiTITLEBARLAPTOP, pLaptopIcons[0], guiTITLEBARICONS, 0 );
05801                           SetCurrentToLastProgramOpened( );
05802                               fMinizingProgram = TRUE;
05803                               fInitTitle = TRUE;
05804                         break;
05805                         case( LAPTOP_MODE_FILES ):
05806                               gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_FILES ] = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MINIMIZED;
05807                           InitTitleBarMaximizeGraphics(guiTITLEBARLAPTOP, pLaptopIcons[5], guiTITLEBARICONS, 2 );
05808                           SetCurrentToLastProgramOpened( );
05809                               fMinizingProgram = TRUE;
05810                               fInitTitle = TRUE;
05811                         break;
05812                         case( LAPTOP_MODE_FINANCES ):
05813                               gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_FINANCES ] = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MINIMIZED;
05814                           InitTitleBarMaximizeGraphics(guiTITLEBARLAPTOP, pLaptopIcons[2], guiTITLEBARICONS, 5 );
05815                               SetCurrentToLastProgramOpened( );
05816                               fMinizingProgram = TRUE;
05817                               fInitTitle = TRUE;
05818                         break;
05819                         case( LAPTOP_MODE_HISTORY ):
05820                               gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_HISTORY ] = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MINIMIZED;
05821                           InitTitleBarMaximizeGraphics(guiTITLEBARLAPTOP, pLaptopIcons[4], guiTITLEBARICONS, 4 );
05822                               SetCurrentToLastProgramOpened( );
05823                               fMinizingProgram = TRUE;
05824                               fInitTitle = TRUE;
05825                         break;
05826                         case( LAPTOP_MODE_PERSONNEL ):
05827                               gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_PERSONNEL ] = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MINIMIZED;
05828                           InitTitleBarMaximizeGraphics(guiTITLEBARLAPTOP, pLaptopIcons[3], guiTITLEBARICONS, 3 );
05829                               SetCurrentToLastProgramOpened( );
05830                               fMinizingProgram = TRUE;
05831                               fInitTitle = TRUE;
05832                         break;
05833                         case( LAPTOP_MODE_NONE ):
05834                          // nothing
05835                         break;
05836                         default:
05837                               gLaptopProgramStates[ LAPTOP_PROGRAM_WEB_BROWSER ] = LAPTOP_PROGRAM_MINIMIZED;
05838                           InitTitleBarMaximizeGraphics(guiTITLEBARLAPTOP, pWebTitle[ 0 ], guiTITLEBARICONS, 1 );
05839                               SetCurrentToLastProgramOpened( );
05840                               gfShowBookmarks = FALSE;
05841                               fShowBookmarkInfo = FALSE;
05842                               fMinizingProgram = TRUE;
05843                               fInitTitle = TRUE;
05844                         break;
05845                   }
05846       }
05847       return;
05848 }

05851 void DisplayProgramBoundingBox( BOOLEAN fMarkButtons )
05852 {
05853             // the border fot eh program
05854       HVOBJECT hHandle;
05855 
05856       GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiLaptopBACKGROUND);
05857   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 1, iScreenWidthOffset + 25, iScreenHeightOffset + 23, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
05858 
05859 // no laptop mode, no border around the program
05860       if( guiCurrentLaptopMode != LAPTOP_MODE_NONE )
05861       {
05862         GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiLaptopBACKGROUND);
05863         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0, iScreenWidthOffset + 108, iScreenHeightOffset + 23, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
05864       }
05865 
05866       if( fMarkButtons || fLoadPendingFlag )
05867       {
05868         MarkButtonsDirty( );
05869         RenderButtons( );
05870       }
05871 
05872 
05873       PrintDate( );
05874 
05875       PrintBalance( );
05876 
05877       PrintNumberOnTeam( );
05878 
05879       // new files or email?
05880       DisplayTaskBarIcons( );
05881       
05882       return;
05883 }

05886 void CreateDestroyMouseRegionForNewMailIcon( void )
05887 {
05888       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
05889 
05890       //. will toggle creation/destruction of the mouse regions used by the new mail icon
05891       
05892       if( fCreated == FALSE )
05893       {
05894             fCreated = TRUE;
05895             MSYS_DefineRegion(&gNewMailIconRegion, LAPTOP__NEW_EMAIL_ICON_X, LAPTOP__NEW_EMAIL_ICON_Y + 5,  LAPTOP__NEW_EMAIL_ICON_X+16,  LAPTOP__NEW_EMAIL_ICON_Y + 16,
05896                 MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 3 , CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, NewEmailIconCallback);
05897             CreateFileAndNewEmailIconFastHelpText( LAPTOP_BN_HLP_TXT_YOU_HAVE_NEW_MAIL, (BOOLEAN)(fUnReadMailFlag == 0 ) );
05898 
05899             MSYS_DefineRegion(&gNewFileIconRegion, LAPTOP__NEW_FILE_ICON_X, LAPTOP__NEW_FILE_ICON_Y + 5,  LAPTOP__NEW_FILE_ICON_X + 16,  LAPTOP__NEW_FILE_ICON_Y + 16,
05900                 MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 3 , CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, NewFileIconCallback);
05901             CreateFileAndNewEmailIconFastHelpText( LAPTOP_BN_HLP_TXT_YOU_HAVE_NEW_FILE, (BOOLEAN)( fNewFilesInFileViewer == 0 ) );
05902       }
05903       else
05904       {
05905             fCreated = FALSE;
05906             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gNewMailIconRegion );
05907             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gNewFileIconRegion );
05908       }
05909 }

05938 
05939 void HandleWWWSubSites( void )
05940 {
05941       // check to see if WW Wait is needed for a sub site within the Web Browser
05942 
05943       if( (guiCurrentLaptopMode == guiPreviousLaptopMode )||( guiCurrentLaptopMode < LAPTOP_MODE_WWW) ||( fLoadPendingFlag == TRUE ) ||( fDoneLoadPending == TRUE ) || ( guiPreviousLaptopMode < LAPTOP_MODE_WWW ) )
05944       {
05945             // no go, leave
05946             return;
05947       }
05948 
05949       fLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
05950       fConnectingToSubPage = TRUE;
05951       
05952       // fast or slow load?
05953       if( gfWWWaitSubSitesVisitedFlags[ guiCurrentLaptopMode - ( LAPTOP_MODE_WWW + 1 ) ] == TRUE )
05954       {
05955             fFastLoadFlag = TRUE;
05956       }
05957       
05958       // set fact we were here
05959       gfWWWaitSubSitesVisitedFlags[ guiCurrentLaptopMode - ( LAPTOP_MODE_WWW + 1 ) ] = TRUE; 
05960 
05961       //Dont show the dlownload screen when switching between these pages
05962       if( ( guiCurrentLaptopMode == LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS ) && ( guiPreviousLaptopMode == LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS_FACIAL_INDEX ) ||
05963                   ( guiCurrentLaptopMode == LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS_FACIAL_INDEX ) && ( guiPreviousLaptopMode == LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS ) )
05964       {
05965             fFastLoadFlag = FALSE;
05966             fLoadPendingFlag = FALSE;
05967 
05968             // set fact we were here
05969             gfWWWaitSubSitesVisitedFlags[ LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS_FACIAL_INDEX - ( LAPTOP_MODE_WWW + 1 ) ] = TRUE; 
05970             gfWWWaitSubSitesVisitedFlags[ LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS - ( LAPTOP_MODE_WWW + 1 ) ] = TRUE; 
05971       }
05972 
05973       return;
05974 }
05975 
05976 
05977 void UpdateStatusOfDisplayingBookMarks( void )
05978 {
05979       // this function will disable showing of bookmarks if in process of download or if we miniming web browser
05980       if( ( fLoadPendingFlag == TRUE ) || ( guiCurrentLaptopMode < LAPTOP_MODE_WWW )  )
05981       {
05982             gfShowBookmarks = FALSE;
05983       }
05984 
05985       return;
05986 }

05989 void InitalizeSubSitesList( void )
05990 {
05991       INT32 iCounter = 0;
05992 
05993       // init all subsites list to not visited
05994       for( iCounter = LAPTOP_MODE_WWW + 1 ; iCounter <= LAPTOP_MODE_SIRTECH; iCounter++ )
05995       {
05996                   gfWWWaitSubSitesVisitedFlags[ iCounter - ( LAPTOP_MODE_WWW + 1 ) ] = FALSE;
05997       }
05998       return;
05999 }

06005       if( guiCurrentLaptopMode <= LAPTOP_MODE_WWW )
06006       {
06007             // not at a web page yet
06008       }
06009       else
06010       {
06011             gfWWWaitSubSitesVisitedFlags[ guiCurrentLaptopMode - ( LAPTOP_MODE_WWW + 1 ) ] = TRUE;
06012       }

06016 
06017 void HandleShiftAltTabKeyInLaptop( void )
06018 {
06019       // will handle the alt tab keying in laptop
06020 
06021       // move to next program
06022       if( fMaximizingProgram == TRUE )
06023       {
06024             return;
06025       }
06026 
06027       switch( guiCurrentLaptopMode )
06028       {
06029             case( LAPTOP_MODE_FINANCES ):
06030                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_PERSONNEL;
06031             break;
06032             case( LAPTOP_MODE_PERSONNEL ):
06033                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_HISTORY;
06034             break;
06035             case( LAPTOP_MODE_HISTORY ):
06036                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_FILES;
06037             break;
06038             case( LAPTOP_MODE_EMAIL ):
06039                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_FINANCES;
06040             break;
06041             case( LAPTOP_MODE_FILES ):
06042                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_WWW;
06043             break;
06044             case( LAPTOP_MODE_NONE ):
06045                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_FINANCES;
06046             break;
06047             case( LAPTOP_MODE_WWW ):
06048                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_EMAIL;
06049             break;
06050             default:
06051                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_EMAIL;
06052             break;
06053       }
06054 
06055       fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
06056 }
06057

06059 void HandleAltTabKeyInLaptop( void )
06060 {
06061       // will handle the alt tab keying in laptop
06062 
06063       // move to next program
06064       // move to next program
06065       if( fMaximizingProgram == TRUE )
06066       {
06067             return;
06068       }
06069 
06070       switch( guiCurrentLaptopMode )
06071       {
06072             case( LAPTOP_MODE_FINANCES ):
06073                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_EMAIL;
06074             break;
06075             case( LAPTOP_MODE_PERSONNEL ):
06076                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_FINANCES;
06077             break;
06078             
06079             case( LAPTOP_MODE_HISTORY ):
06080                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_PERSONNEL;
06081             break;
06082             case( LAPTOP_MODE_EMAIL ):
06083                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_WWW;
06084             break;
06085             case( LAPTOP_MODE_FILES ):
06086                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_HISTORY;
06087             break;
06088             case( LAPTOP_MODE_NONE ):
06089                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_EMAIL;
06090             break;
06091             default:
06092                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_FILES;
06093             break;
06094       }
06095 
06096       fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
06097 }

06101 // display the 2 second book mark instruction
06102 void DisplayWebBookMarkNotify( void )
06103 {
06104       static BOOLEAN fOldShow = FALSE;
06105       HVOBJECT hLapTopIconHandle;
06106 
06107 
06108       // handle the timer for this thing
06109       HandleWebBookMarkNotifyTimer( );
06110 
06111       // are we about to start showing box? or did we just stop?
06112       if( ( ( fOldShow == FALSE )||( fReDrawBookMarkInfo ) ) && ( fShowBookmarkInfo == TRUE ) )
06113       {
06114             fOldShow = TRUE;
06115             fReDrawBookMarkInfo = FALSE;
06116 
06117             // show background objects
06118             GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiDOWNLOADTOP);
06119         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 0,DOWNLOAD_X, DOWNLOAD_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
06120     GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiDOWNLOADMID);
06121             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 0,DOWNLOAD_X, DOWNLOAD_Y+DOWN_HEIGHT, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
06122             GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiDOWNLOADBOT);
06123             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 0,DOWNLOAD_X, DOWNLOAD_Y+2*DOWN_HEIGHT, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
06124             GetVideoObject(&hLapTopIconHandle, guiTITLEBARICONS);
06125             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hLapTopIconHandle, 1,DOWNLOAD_X + 4, DOWNLOAD_Y + 1, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
06126 
06127             // font stuff
06128             SetFont(DOWNLOAD_FONT);
06129             SetFontForeground(FONT_WHITE);
06130             SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
06131             SetFontShadow(NO_SHADOW);
06132 
06133             // display download string
06134             mprintf( DOWN_STRING_X, DOWN_STRING_Y, pShowBookmarkString[ 0 ]);
06135 
06136             SetFont(BOOK_FONT);
06137             SetFontForeground(FONT_BLACK);
06138             SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
06139             SetFontShadow(NO_SHADOW);
06140 
06141             // now draw the message
06142             DisplayWrappedString(( INT16 )( DOWN_STRING_X - 42 ),(UINT16)(DOWN_STRING_Y + 20), BOOK_WIDTH + 45, 2,BOOK_FONT,FONT_BLACK, pShowBookmarkString[ 1 ],FONT_BLACK,FALSE,CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
06143 
06144             // invalidate region
06145             InvalidateRegion(DOWNLOAD_X, DOWNLOAD_Y, DOWNLOAD_X + 150, DOWNLOAD_Y + 100);
06146 
06147       }
06148       else if( ( fOldShow == TRUE ) && ( fShowBookmarkInfo == FALSE ) )
06149       { 
06150             //MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gLapTopScreenRegion );
06151             fOldShow = FALSE;
06152             fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
06153       }
06154 
06155       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
06156 
06157       return;
06158 }
06159 
06160 void HandleWebBookMarkNotifyTimer( void )
06161 {
06162       static INT32 iBaseTime = 0;
06163       INT32 iDifference = 0;
06164       static BOOLEAN fOldShowBookMarkInfo = FALSE;
06165 
06166       
06167       // check if maxing or mining?
06168       if( ( fMaximizingProgram == TRUE ) || ( fMinizingProgram == TRUE ) )
06169       {
06170             fOldShowBookMarkInfo |= fShowBookmarkInfo;
06171             fShowBookmarkInfo = FALSE;
06172             return;
06173       }
06174 
06175             // if we were going to show this pop up, but were delayed, then do so now
06176       fShowBookmarkInfo |= fOldShowBookMarkInfo;
06177 
06178       // reset old flag
06179       fOldShowBookMarkInfo = FALSE;
06180 
06181       // if current mode is too low, then reset
06182       if( guiCurrentLaptopMode < LAPTOP_MODE_WWW )
06183       {
06184             fShowBookmarkInfo = FALSE;
06185       }
06186 
06187       // if showing bookmarks, don't show help
06188       if( gfShowBookmarks == TRUE )
06189       {
06190             fShowBookmarkInfo = FALSE;
06191       }
06192 
06193       // check if flag false, is so, leave
06194       if( fShowBookmarkInfo == FALSE )
06195       {
06196             iBaseTime = 0;
06197             return;
06198       }
06199 
06200 
06201       // check if this is the first time in here
06202       if( iBaseTime == 0 )
06203       {
06204             iBaseTime = GetJA2Clock( );
06205             return;
06206       }
06207 
06208       iDifference = GetJA2Clock( ) - iBaseTime;
06209 
06210       fReDrawBookMarkInfo = TRUE;
06211 
06212       if( iDifference > DISPLAY_TIME_FOR_WEB_BOOKMARK_NOTIFY )
06213       {
06214             // waited long enough, stop showing
06215             iBaseTime = 0;
06216             fShowBookmarkInfo = FALSE;
06217       }
06218 
06219       return;
06220 }
06221

06223 void ClearOutTempLaptopFiles( void )
06224 {
06225       // clear out all temp files from laptop
06226       
06227       // file file
06228       if (  (FileExists( "files.dat" ) == TRUE ) )
06229       {
06230              FileClearAttributes( "files.dat" );
06231              FileDelete( "files.dat" );
06232       }
06233 
06234       // finances
06235       if (  (FileExists( "finances.dat" ) == TRUE ) )
06236       {
06237              FileClearAttributes( "finances.dat" );
06238              FileDelete( "finances.dat" );
06239       }
06240 
06241       // email
06242       if (  (FileExists( "email.dat" ) == TRUE ) )
06243       {
06244              FileClearAttributes( "email.dat" );
06245              FileDelete( "email.dat" );
06246       }
06247 
06248       // history
06249       if (  (FileExists( "history.dat" ) == TRUE ) )
06250       {
06251              FileClearAttributes( "history.dat" );
06252              FileDelete( "history.dat" );
06253       }
06254 
06255 }

06257 
06258 BOOLEAN SaveLaptopInfoToSavedGame( HWFILE hFile )
06259 {
06260       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;    
06261       UINT32      uiSize;
06262 
06263 
06264       // Save The laptop information
06265       FileWrite( hFile, &LaptopSaveInfo, sizeof( LaptopSaveInfoStruct ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
06266       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( LaptopSaveInfoStruct ) )
06267       {
06268             return(FALSE);
06269       }
06270 
06271       //If there is anything in the Bobby Ray Orders on Delivery 
06272       if( LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderUsed )
06273       {
06274             //Allocate memory for the information
06275             uiSize = sizeof( BobbyRayOrderStruct ) * LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderItems;
06276 
06277             // Load The laptop information
06278             FileWrite( hFile, LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray, uiSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
06279             if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSize)
06280             {
06281                   return(FALSE);
06282             }
06283       }
06284 
06285 
06286       //If there is any Insurance Payouts in progress
06287       if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubNumberLifeInsurancePayoutUsed )
06288       {
06289             //Allocate memory for the information
06290             uiSize = sizeof( LIFE_INSURANCE_PAYOUT ) * LaptopSaveInfo.ubNumberLifeInsurancePayouts;
06291 
06292             // Load The laptop information
06293             FileWrite( hFile, LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts, uiSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
06294             if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSize )
06295             {
06296                   return(FALSE);
06297             }
06298       }
06299 
06300       return( TRUE );
06301 }
06302 
06303 
06304 
06305 
06306 BOOLEAN LoadLaptopInfoFromSavedGame( HWFILE hFile )
06307 {
06308       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead=0; 
06309       UINT32      uiSize;
06310       
06311 
06312       //if there is memory allocated for the BobbyR orders
06313       if( LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderItems )
06314       {
06315             //Free the memory 
06316             if( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray )
06317                   MemFree( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray );
06318             LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray = NULL;
06319       }
06320 
06321       //if there is memory allocated for life insurance payouts
06322       if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubNumberLifeInsurancePayouts )
06323       {
06324             if( !LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts )
06325                   Assert( 0 );      //Should never happen
06326 
06327             //Free the memory 
06328             MemFree( LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts );
06329             LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts = NULL;
06330       }
06331 
06332       // Load The laptop information
06333       FileRead( hFile, &LaptopSaveInfo, sizeof( LaptopSaveInfoStruct ), &uiNumBytesRead );
06334       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( LaptopSaveInfoStruct ) )
06335       {
06336             return(FALSE);
06337       }
06338 
06339       //If there is anything in the Bobby Ray Orders on Delivery 
06340       if( LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderUsed )
06341       {
06342             //Allocate memory for the information
06343             uiSize = sizeof( BobbyRayOrderStruct ) * LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderItems;
06344 
06345             LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray = (BobbyRayOrderStruct *) MemAlloc( uiSize );
06346             Assert( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray );
06347 
06348             // Load The laptop information
06349             FileRead( hFile, LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray, uiSize, &uiNumBytesRead );
06350             if( uiNumBytesRead != uiSize )
06351             {
06352                   return(FALSE);
06353             }
06354       }
06355       else
06356       {
06357             LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderItems = 0;
06358             LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray = NULL;
06359       }
06360 
06361 
06362       //If there is any Insurance Payouts in progress
06363       if( LaptopSaveInfo.ubNumberLifeInsurancePayoutUsed )
06364       {
06365             //Allocate memory for the information
06366             uiSize = sizeof( LIFE_INSURANCE_PAYOUT ) * LaptopSaveInfo.ubNumberLifeInsurancePayouts;
06367 
06368             LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts = (LIFE_INSURANCE_PAYOUT *) MemAlloc( uiSize );
06369             Assert( LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts );
06370 
06371             // Load The laptop information
06372             FileRead( hFile, LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts, uiSize, &uiNumBytesRead );
06373             if( uiNumBytesRead != uiSize )
06374             {
06375                   return(FALSE);
06376             }
06377       }
06378       else
06379       {
06380             LaptopSaveInfo.ubNumberLifeInsurancePayouts = 0;
06381             LaptopSaveInfo.pLifeInsurancePayouts = NULL;
06382       }
06383 
06384 
06385       return( TRUE );
06386 }

06393 INT32 WWaitDelayIncreasedIfRaining( INT32 iUnitTime )
06394 {
06395       INT32 iRetVal = 0;
06396 
06397       if( guiEnvWeather & WEATHER_FORECAST_THUNDERSHOWERS )
06398       {
06399             iRetVal = (INT32)( iUnitTime * (FLOAT) 0.80 );
06400       }
06401       else if( guiEnvWeather & WEATHER_FORECAST_SHOWERS )
06402       {
06403             iRetVal = (INT32)( iUnitTime * (FLOAT) 0.6 );
06404       }
06405 
06406       return( iRetVal );
06407 }
06408 
06409 
06410 BOOLEAN IsItRaining()
06411 {
06412       if( guiEnvWeather & WEATHER_FORECAST_SHOWERS || guiEnvWeather & WEATHER_FORECAST_THUNDERSHOWERS )
06413             return( TRUE );
06414       else
06415             return( FALSE );
06416 }

06434 void CreateFileAndNewEmailIconFastHelpText( UINT32 uiHelpTextID, BOOLEAN fClearHelpText )
06435 {
06436       MOUSE_REGION *pRegion;
06437 
06438       switch( uiHelpTextID )
06439       {
06440             case LAPTOP_BN_HLP_TXT_YOU_HAVE_NEW_MAIL:
06441                   pRegion = &gNewMailIconRegion;
06442                   break;
06443 
06444             case LAPTOP_BN_HLP_TXT_YOU_HAVE_NEW_FILE:
06445                   pRegion = &gNewFileIconRegion;
06446                   break;
06447 
06448             default:
06449                   Assert(0);
06450                   return;
06451       }
06452 
06453       if( fClearHelpText )
06454             SetRegionFastHelpText( pRegion, L"" );
06455       else
06456             SetRegionFastHelpText( pRegion, gzLaptopHelpText[ uiHelpTextID ] );
06457 
06458       //fUnReadMailFlag
06459       //fNewFilesInFileViewer
06460 }
